NK103(pe)017:1: // ra t+na a lam k+aa ra ti sma ////
NK103(pe)017:4: rat+na a lam k+aa ra n+aa ma /
NK103(pe)017:6: rin po che rgyan zhes bya ba /
NK103(pe)017:7: ye shes kyi rang 'od rang snang ba'i lha rdo
NK103(pe)017:8: mi phyed pas rje rang gsal bas sems bdud bzhi
NK103(pe)017:9: 'joms pas dpa' la yul thun mong dang khyad par
NK103(pe)017:11: ma nor byang chub kyi sems lhun grub gsum du rtag tu snang ba las //
NK103(pe)017:12: de ltar ma shes shes bdag tu bzung bas /
NK103(pe)017:13: gzhan du snang ba'i cha las nyon mongs pas kun nas bslang ste las gsum //
NK103(pe)017:14: spyad pas snod bcud du 'khrul cing phyi nang du 'khor ba'i sna tshogs su snang ba 'di nyid //
NK103(pe)017:15: 'og ma pa ltar ma bcos kyang sku gsum du ro gcig dbyer med du rtogs pa 'dud //
NK103(pe)017:16: rang rig pa chos thams cad du rang snang ba
NK103(pe)017:17: nyid brjod bya ru ye nas gnas pa de la
NK103(pe)017:18: // sgrib pa med bar rtag tu gsal kyang nges
NK103(pe)017:19: par snang ba'i rkyen bzhi dang bral ba de nyid
NK103(pe)017:20: // do // mi rgyu shes pa'i blo yis nga bdag tu nan gyis brtags pas //
NK103(pe)017:21: gzhan du snang ste bdag gzhan cha las 'dzin rkyen
NK103(pe)017:22: sa dug lnga'i dngos por zhen cing 'thas pa las
NK103(pe)017:23: // 'du byed sems pa yang srid 'phen nus kyi rlung las gsum gis g.yos pas na //
NK103(pe)017:24: phyi snod dang nang bcud 'bras bu kyi sdug bsngal gsum la sogs pa'i ngo bor smin pa de //
NK103(pe)017:25: thub pa'i dbang brjod byed pos spong sbyong gi gnyen
NK103(pe)017:26: pos bcom pa'i thabs mtshan nyid ldan nas mya ngan
NK103(pe)017:30: rdo rje 'dzin pas bsgyur ba phyi rgyud dang mnga' ru mdzad pa nang pa gsungs //
NK103(pe)017:31: gzhi ji bzhin par rang shar ba'i skyes bus de
NK103(pe)017:32: dag ltar ma bcos par rang sar bkrol ba'i thabs
NK103(pe)017:33: // rgyal ba rigs lngas sems dpa' rdo rje la brda dgongs kyis sbyar bas //
NK103(pe)017:34: des yang sprul thugs sras skad cig mas mthar thug
NK103(pe)017:35: gi sar bton nas des klong dgu bam po nyi
NK103(pe)017:36: khri brjod bya'i don mtshon kyang //
NK103(pe)017:37: de dag gi don dkrugs khargyas las bsdus kabsrang gabas //
NK103(pe)017:38: 'dir mos shing 'jug pa dgos pa 'jug pa'i gang
NK103(pe)017:39: zag gis brjod bya'i don rtogs nas goms te don
NK103(pe)017:41: des gdul bya gzhan drang ba'i phyir rin chen mdzes par dgod par bya'o zhes so //
NK103(pe)017:42: go cha'i gyon pa rjes su rgyas pa la khyab
NK103(pe)017:43: pas lus don gyi mdo tsam zhig rnam par gzhag
NK103(pe)017:44: pa // ma bcos gnyug ma dang 'khrul ba'i snang ba yang ngo bos ma nor ba'i gzhi //
NK103(pe)017:45: de ngo shes nas ngang du 'dris par rnal 'byor pa'i blo 'jug pas ni lam //
NK103(pe)017:46: gzhi ji bzhin pa nyid du mngon du gyur rdzogs pa ni 'bras bu //
NK103(pe)017:47: de gsum kyang chos nyid rang snang du dbyer med par thig le nya ga gcig gi ngang ste //
NK103(pe)017:48: brjod byed rgyas pa 'byung ba kun gyi rtsa ba lus kyi tshul du mdor gzhag go //
NK103(pe)017:49: dang po'i yan lag rgyas pa la gnas lugs dang 'khrul tshul lo //
NK103(pe)017:50: ye nas gnas pa'i ngo bo spyi dang bye brag gi mtshon pa'i dpe //
NK103(pe)017:51: ming don nges tshig blo dang 'tshams pa'i ming grangs gzhan sel don gnyer gyi dgos ched dang //
NK103(pe)017:52: lhun grub gsum gyi rang bzhin de gsum gyi mtshan nyid ji srid gnas pa'i dus dang //
NK103(pe)017:53: bzhi tshan gnyis kyi rim pa bzlog ste rgyas par bstan pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:54: rgyu yis bskyed pa la mi gnas par chos nyid rang snang yin bas //
NK103(pe)017:55: thog ma med cing mthar mi nub pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:56: rang bzhin cir yang ma dmigs rnam pa thams cad
NK103(pe)017:57: du ma 'gags mtshan nyid yul med par rang snang
NK103(pe)017:58: bas // spyod yul dang bral bas gsang ba'i mtha'
NK103(pe)017:59: dbus kyi tha snyad grol bas dbu ma chen por
NK103(pe)017:60: bas // gnas pa'o // rang bzhin ni lhun grub rnam pa gsum la //
NK103(pe)017:61: yid spros pa sna tshogs su skye ba'i rang bzhin
NK103(pe)017:62: nyid spros pa thams cad dang bral bas 'khor 'das
NK103(pe)017:63: kyi // tha snyad gnyis pa nam mkha' ltar du yangs //
NK103(pe)017:64: rnam pa ni sna tshogs su ma 'gags par 'od gsal bas //
NK103(pe)017:65: sgo lnga'i yul rnams ma 'gags par ngos gzung med pas sgyu mar gsal //
NK103(pe)017:66: mtshan nyid ni rang snang yin pas gzung 'dzin dang bral te //
NK103(pe)017:67: mi gnas par rang rig pa byang chub kyi sems so //
NK103(pe)017:68: de dag kyang dbyer med par rang gsal bas thig le nyag gcig go //
NK103(pe)017:69: dgos ched gnyis kyi phyir lhun grub gsum du brdar btags te /
NK103(pe)017:71: bsal 1te rtogs pa don du 2gnyer ba'o //
NK103(pe)017:72: ther zug rtag par 'dzin pa dang rol pa'i snang ba chad par lta ba dang //
NK103(pe)017:73: rtag chad gnyis dang bral ba la bltos pa'i dbus su 'dzin pa'i //
NK103(pe)017:74: mtha' dang gsum bsal ba'i phyir rang bzhin rnam pa
NK103(pe)017:75: mtshan nyid du brdar gdags 0kyi sgra ji bzhin par
NK103(pe)017:76: ni min no // shes 2bya tshogs brgyad la nyon yid dang nga bdag gzung 'dzin dang //
NK103(pe)017:77: yid spros pa sna tshogs dang mtshan ma lngar sgo
NK103(pe)017:78: lnga yul lnga la 'dzin pa dang gsal ba skye
NK103(pe)017:79: lugs gsum // rang sku gsum du grol bar bstan
NK103(pe)017:80: pa'i phyir lhun grub gsum du btags kyi mi zhen
NK103(pe)017:82: gdul bya rang rang gi blo dang yi mtsham tshad du mi brtags pa'i grangs ni //
NK103(pe)017:83: spros bral rang gsal bas byang sems 1ye nas gnas
NK103(pe)017:84: pas lhun grub zug rngu med pas bde chen dang
NK103(pe)017:85: // yul med pas rang snang mu mtha' med pas dbu ma bzang ngan med pas mnyam pa nyid //
NK103(pe)017:86: lhag ma ma lus pas rdzogs pa chen po rgyur gyur pas chos kyi dbyings //
NK103(pe)017:87: tha dad ma grub pas gnyis med blo'i yul du
NK103(pe)017:88: ma grub pas bsam 'das byed pa po med pas
NK103(pe)017:89: ma bcos pa zhes 11grags kun la sbyar //
NK103(pe)017:90: ming gi rnam grangs rgyal bas kyang brjod pa las 'das so //
NK103(pe)017:91: 'khor 'das gnyis kyi bsdus pa'i chos brjod bya rjod
NK103(pe)017:92: byed du snang ba kun gyi dngos gzhi yin pas
NK103(pe)017:93: // mthon po 'das pa dang dman pa 'khor ba
NK103(pe)017:94: kun gyi 'byung ba'i gzhir gsungs ye shes gsang ba
NK103(pe)017:95: las thams cad rol bas 'khor ba yin /
NK103(pe)017:96: 'dzin rtog spangs pas sa ngas rgyas yin //
NK103(pe)017:98: de dpe yis mtshon na spyi gnas lug tsam dang bye brag lhun grub gsum gyi dpe ste //
NK103(pe)017:101: gser gyis gzhi bzhin 111111du mu matha'i phyogs karis kun
NK103(pe)017:102: la khyab pas khargya che la rtogs dka' bas gting
NK103(pe)017:103: zab // cir yang mi gartog la re ba skong bsam brtags kyi rkyen ngagyis cir yang snang //
NK103(pe)017:104: cir yang ma 'gags par rtsal casnang gsal chabyed kyi
NK103(pe)017:105: rkyen la ma rag par rang gsal dus gsum du
NK103(pe)017:107: yon tan gyi ldog cha res dpe kun kyang don dang mthun no //
NK103(pe)017:108: smag gi mun pa dang chu'i gnyer ma dang nyi
NK103(pe)017:109: ma shar ba dang gsum gyis lhun grub gsum mtshon
NK103(pe)017:110: pa ni / rtsa ba'i rgyud ye shes gsang ba'i
NK103(pe)017:111: le'u drug pa ru gsungs pa gzhi mtshon ces drang
NK103(pe)017:112: pa ni / de bzhin no // ngo bo ni
NK103(pe)017:113: chos thams cad sems nyid rang snang ba nyid bcud
NK103(pe)017:114: pa ni / de bzhin no // 'dus pas //
NK103(pe)017:115: snying por gnas pa de sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs
NK103(pe)017:118: rang snang lhun grub ye gnas pa /
NK103(pe)017:119: ye nas gnas par bgrod pa'i lam gyis btsal mi dgos //
NK103(pe)017:123: dpe dang snang tshul nyes pa grangs //
NK103(pe)017:124: lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig kapa ni kun btags
NK103(pe)017:125: bdag tu lta ba ni kamtshungs par ldan pa'i dang
NK103(pe)017:126: // lhan kha cig byed rgyur ka kha yang sprul
NK103(pe)017:127: dpa' bos gter btang du bshad rang byung zhes drang
NK103(pe)017:128: // // ye nas rang byung lnga ru gnas kyang
NK103(pe)017:129: rin chen gdams ngag ston pa'i rkyen bzhis dbul ba
NK103(pe)017:130: // // dang // sems nyid rang snang yin pa'i
NK103(pe)017:131: phyir bdag gzhan tha dad du brtags 0te 'khrul pa
NK103(pe)017:132: // // dang // byung ngo // de 0yi cha las nyon mongs pa lngas las gsum spyad pas //
NK103(pe)017:133: snang ba snod dang brtags pa bcud tha dad pa'i gnas su 'phangs //
NK103(pe)017:134: rgyu rkyen de yis 'dod gzugs gzugs med kyi khams gsum gyi phyi snod dang nang bcud du //
NK103(pe)017:135: 'khrul zhing rgyun drug tu 'khor ba drag pos nges nges 'drar smin no //
NK103(pe)017:136: gnas lugs yin par ye nas rang gnas pa dang de ngo /
NK103(pe)017:137: ma shes gnyis 'byung ba'i dus la pa //
NK103(pe)017:138: snga phyi mi gnas pa thog ma'i mtha' med //
NK103(pe)017:139: sems can tshad las 'das pas phri bas mi zad de tha ma'i matha'ang bral //
NK103(pe)017:140: dus rgyun du 'khor ba mi stongs bar 'khor lo yang yang du skor ba ni //
NK103(pe)017:141: dper na zol chu brgyud pa'i 'khor lo dbu ma la 'jug pa'i 'grel pa las /
NK103(pe)017:142: bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pa'i 'jig rten 'di ni /
NK103(pe)017:143: las dang nyon mongs pa'i thag pas ches dam du
NK103(pe)017:144: bsdams pa 'khrul 'khor mkhan rnam par shes pas bskyod
NK103(pe)017:145: pa la rag las par 'jug pa /
NK103(pe)017:147: srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa la thug par zab par bar med par 'phyan pa /
NK103(pe)017:148: rang gi ngang nyid kyis thur du 'gro bar 'jug pa /
NK103(pe)017:149: 'bad pas ji zhig ltar drang bar bya ba mi
NK103(pe)017:150: shes pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang las
NK103(pe)017:151: dang skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum yod
NK103(pe)017:152: kyang / snga ma dang phyi ma dang bar yi rim pa nges par mi zin pa /
NK103(pe)017:153: nyi ma re re zhing sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang /
NK103(pe)017:154: 'gyur ba'i duhkha nyid dag gis gcog pa'i phyir /
NK103(pe)017:155: zo chu rgyud mo'i gnas skabs las ma 'das par gnas pa zhig ste /
NK103(pe)017:158: phyi nang gi rten 'brel bcu gnyis rgyu 'bras kyi shugs kyis yang yang du bskyar ba'o //
NK103(pe)017:159: don du grub pa yod pa min kyang phyi'i don ltar du snang ba ni //
NK103(pe)017:160: rab rib kyi rkyen gyis dkrugs pa'i mig gi dbang po la skra zla snang ba bzhin no //
NK103(pe)017:161: ma rig pa gnyis kyi 'dam gyi phung po'i gzhi la //
NK103(pe)017:162: nyon mongs pa dug gi gzhi sa bon btab pas //
NK103(pe)017:163: sdug bsngal gsum la sogs pa sna tshogs kyi nyes pas rgyud nyen la //
NK103(pe)017:164: gnas skabs thar pa dang mthar thug bde chen gyi srog dang bral ba'o //
NK103(pe)017:165: rnal ma'i kadon ma rtogs 1par rigs drug kha log par rtog 1pa rtag chad //
NK103(pe)017:166: rgyal ba'i bka' gala phyogs char 1brtags pas 111'khrul pa rtsol brgyad //
NK103(pe)017:167: log pa'i nying karkyen dang bral kyang 'gro ba rigs drug ni //
NK103(pe)017:168: rang rang gi las kyi zhen pa tshul so sor gnas //
NK103(pe)017:169: ston khapa drug la sogs pa'i bstan pa log pa yis //
NK103(pe)017:170: rang bzhin dang rnam pa'i don las rtag pa dang chad par log par bsgyur ro //
NK103(pe)017:171: rgyal gaba'i bka' las phyogs ris med pa las //
NK103(pe)017:172: bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa las dang ngo bo
NK103(pe)017:173: chos nyid kyis phye bas tha dad snang ba ni
NK103(pe)017:174: // gzung yul 'dzin sems rdul phra rab dang skad cig ma don dam du 'dod //
NK103(pe)017:175: rten 'brel sgyu ma tsam du bzung yul rang bzhin
NK103(pe)017:176: med par rtogs kyang 'dzin pa skad cig mar 'dod
NK103(pe)017:177: pa can // bden pa gnyis ni kun rdzob sna
NK103(pe)017:178: tshogs su snang ba la don dam ci yang mi
NK103(pe)017:179: pa can // gnas pa'o // kun rdzob de pad
NK103(pe)017:180: rdo rje'i rigs gsum ye shes pa rje bo dam
NK103(pe)017:181: tshig pa 'bangs la don dam mtha' bzhi rnam par
NK103(pe)017:182: pa can // gnas pa'o // dag cing // yul
NK103(pe)017:183: yul can bya byed gang rung bsdus pas rigs bzhir
NK103(pe)017:184: kun rdzob gnas pa la ye shes pa dpon dam
NK103(pe)017:185: tshig pa g.yog don dam stong //
NK103(pe)017:186: yo ga pas rigs lnga gsal na tha dad bzang
NK103(pe)017:187: ngan med pas grogs po'i tshul don dam par rnam
NK103(pe)017:189: ma h+aa snang stong gnyis su med par zung du 'jug pa la bsnyen sgrub yan lag can //
NK103(pe)017:190: a nu yul dbyings sems ye shes de gnyis 'du 'bral med pas bde ba chen po //
NK103(pe)017:191: gnas lugs yin min gcig la rang rang gi 'dod pas nges par gzung ba brgyad po de //
NK103(pe)017:192: dper mu stegs pas gang zag gi bdag med pa las bdag rtag par bzung ba bzhin no //
NK103(pe)017:193: rang byung gnyug mar gnas kyang gsal byed kyi rkyen med pas //
NK103(pe)017:194: rig pa'i rtsal chen po ma byang bar //
NK103(pe)017:195: rigs drug ka dang mu stegs rtag khachad dang rtsol ba ga brgyad po'i gazhi'o //
NK103(pe)017:196: gzhi de rtogs nas de'i ngang du 'dris par byed pa'i thabs lam la grangs gnyis te //
NK103(pe)017:197: don lam rtogs goms dang de ming mtshon cing brda sprod pa'i tshig gi lam mo //
NK103(pe)017:198: dang po la lam rang gi ngo bo dang cha rkyen yan lag te gnyis so //
NK103(pe)017:199: lam nyid la ngo bo nges tshig dpe //
NK103(pe)017:200: yon tan bral skyon gnas pa'i tshad //
NK103(pe)017:201: tshul dang grangs kyis bzhi tshan gnyis yin no //
NK103(pe)017:202: lta ba rtogs nas de'i ngang la 'dris shing goms par gang gnas pa de'i //
NK103(pe)017:203: lam gyi ngo bo ni byang chub kyi sems 0 nyid yin no //
NK103(pe)017:204: don der 0rnal 'byor pa'i rtogs goms kyi blo 'jug 1pas //
NK103(pe)017:205: 'og nas gong du bgrod pas ma yin kyang de 1nyid kyis lam zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)017:206: mtshon par byed pa'i dpe sngar bshad pa bzhin du spyir lam la yang 'jug la //
NK103(pe)017:207: khyad par du tshul ngan gyi rtsol ba med par rang gsal ba ni mar me la bzhin //
NK103(pe)017:208: nyes pas ma gos par thams cad du rang snang ba ni pad+ma dang 'dra //
NK103(pe)017:209: rtogs pa rgyun du goms pas gnas pa ni chu bo'i rgyun ltar ro //
NK103(pe)017:210: tshig dang don mtshon pa la gnas skabs kyis dpe de dag 'jug go //
NK103(pe)017:211: yon tan gyi grangs kyi mtha' brjod pa las 'das //
NK103(pe)017:212: rang mtshan mngon sum du rtogs pas chos nyid shes
NK103(pe)017:213: bya rang 'dzin pa yul med rang gsal gyi ngang
NK103(pe)017:215: spyod yul rang rig tu shar te /
NK103(pe)017:216: gnyis med pas shes bya dag nas chos sku mthong ngo //
NK103(pe)017:219: de'i ngang du goms pas nyon mongs pa dang bag la nyal gyi sgrib pa //
NK103(pe)017:220: ma spangs par rang sar grol ba yin //
NK103(pe)017:221: dper na rgya mtsho dwangs na nyi zla'i gzugs brnyan
NK103(pe)017:222: 'char ba bzhin du 'od mi rtog 'dzin med ces
NK103(pe)017:223: drang // pha rol phyin drug tshad lam rim bsod chen zhes drang med bzhi //
NK103(pe)017:224: stong pa nyid mtshan ma med //
NK103(pe)017:226: rnam thar sgo gsum skyabs su 'gro ba gsum dang //
NK103(pe)017:227: 'dris pa mi brjed pas dran pa dang bya ba la shes bzhin du 'jug pa dang /
NK103(pe)017:228: mi dge ba'i gnyen po bag yod gtam //
NK103(pe)017:229: sdom pa 'dul sdom dam tshig gsum dang shes rab gsum thos bsam bsgom pa //
NK103(pe)017:232: las bzhi bslab pa'i mtha' bcu don bsdus las /
NK103(pe)017:233: dam tshig gzhi rgyud dgrol ba dang /
NK103(pe)017:234: sgo mo bsdur dang phul dbyung dang /
NK103(pe)017:235: thag gcad pa dang nyams blang dang /
NK103(pe)017:236: la dor spyod dang dbang rim dang /
NK103(pe)017:237: man ngag don dang mdo bsdus rnams /
NK103(pe)017:238: rnal 'byor bslab pa'i mtha' bcur bshad //
NK103(pe)017:241: gter gtad drang klong dgu dang de dag rnams thabs
NK103(pe)017:242: chen po rtogs pa'i ngang du gnas pa gcig gis
NK103(pe)017:243: rdzogs pa'o // lam med pa'i skyon kyang gong gi yon tan de las bzlog pa mtshungs te //
NK103(pe)017:244: ma rig 'dam gyi phung po zhes gzhi nyid skabs su bstan pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:245: chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid mngon sum du the
NK103(pe)017:246: tshom med par nges par rtogs pa'i tshad rang mtshan
NK103(pe)017:249: de'i ngang la 'dris pa'i nges par gdeng du gyur pa'i tshad rtags na zhes /
NK103(pe)017:251: yang sprul dpa' bos gter gtad du gsungs par shes par bya'o //
NK103(pe)017:252: rgyal bu rgyal sar 'don pa'i tshul du //
NK103(pe)017:253: rang la rdzogs pa'i lhun grub gsum gyi don bstan pas rtogs te /
NK103(pe)017:254: de yi ngang la goms pas 'dris par gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:255: rnam par dbye ba la lam gcig car rim gyis pa gnyis te //
NK103(pe)017:256: rig pa'i shes rab kyi rtsal chen po rdzogs pa'i blo yang rab tu gyur pa la //
NK103(pe)017:257: rtogs pa dang grol ba chig chod nyid du rang snang bstan pas //
NK103(pe)017:258: rtsol ba med pa ni khyung chen po nam mkha' la ldings pa 'dra'o //
NK103(pe)017:259: rang rgyud chig chod du ma smin pa'i bus pa dbang po 'bring dang tha ma la //
NK103(pe)017:260: thabs chen brgyud pa'i lung theg pa brgyad kyis blo dang 'tsham tshad du bstan ni //
NK103(pe)017:261: gu ljo byis pa rim gyis smin par byed pa'i tshul dang mthun no //
NK103(pe)017:262: don lam de yi cha rkyen gyi yan lag la gsum ste //
NK103(pe)017:263: rtogs par byed pa'i thabs dang goms par byed pa'i thabs dang //
NK103(pe)017:264: de'i ngang la gnas pa'i sa'i bar chod bsrung ba'o //
NK103(pe)017:265: dang po'i rtogs byed kyi yan lag la rnam pa bzhi ste //
NK103(pe)017:266: ngang rang bzhin bdag nyid chen po'i /
NK103(pe)017:268: bdag nyid chen po gcig gi gtan tshigs gsum gyis gzhigs la lta ba rtogs pa dang //
NK103(pe)017:269: mtshon par byed pa'i dpe dang don gyi phyogs re mthun par spyi rnam tsam shes //
NK103(pe)017:270: man ngag rim par brgyud pas mngon sum par bstan no //
NK103(pe)017:271: de yi yid ches par byed pa lung las shes //
NK103(pe)017:272: gtan tshigs dang dpe yis mtshon pa dang //
NK103(pe)017:273: lung dang de dag rtsa ba'i rgyud ye shes gsang
NK103(pe)017:274: ba'i le'u gnyis pa dang gter gtad le'u gsum khapar
NK103(pe)017:275: // lnga ka pa'i don la dpa' ga bos bkrol bas 'dir bri mi dgos //
NK103(pe)017:276: man ngag gi yan lag la rnam pa gsum ste //
NK103(pe)017:277: man ngag rin chen 1blang pa'i gzhi slob dpon dang de 1yi gnas slob ma dang //
NK103(pe)017:278: don nges par rtogs pa'i bya ba'i thabs tshegs dang bral ba'i man ngag 0rang gi ngo bo'o //
NK103(pe)017:279: 'di 0 la slob dpon rnam pa gnyis te //
NK103(pe)017:280: ma nor nges pa'i slob dpon ni //
NK103(pe)017:281: rang gi sems nyid rang bla ma rin po che yin te //
NK103(pe)017:282: de ni byin rlabs dang brgyud pa'i man ngag kun gyi bdag nyid yin pas //
NK103(pe)017:283: brda bral rang grol ba'i man ngag rang bzhin gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ston //
NK103(pe)017:284: brda yis de dang 'brel ba'i don nges par sprod pa'i slob dpon ni //
NK103(pe)017:285: nges pa chu bo bzhi yi don thugs la gnas //
NK103(pe)017:286: brjod bya'i don dang 'brel pa'i rjod byed brda tshig
NK103(pe)017:287: dang ldan pa can des rgyal ba'i rgyud dag ston
NK103(pe)017:289: rtogs goms kyi gdeng dang ldan par nges par rtogs
NK103(pe)017:290: pa'i don nyid la blo gnas shing rtogs pa'i shes
NK103(pe)017:291: rab dang gzhan phan gyi snying rje la blo gnas
NK103(pe)017:292: pa'o // rin chen man ngag sbyin pa'i gnas slob ma bstan pa la //
NK103(pe)017:293: ma nor nges pa'i slob ma ni //
NK103(pe)017:294: rang gi sems nyid rang gis rtogs par 'dod1 //
NK103(pe)017:295: de 1yi bya ba'i thabs kyi yan lag dbang la sogs pa lnga can //
NK103(pe)017:296: ma nor ba'i sems nyid ma bcos par rtogs goms kyis 'dzin nus shing //
NK103(pe)017:297: gzhi rang sems gnyug ma yul dang bral bar go bar nus pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:298: brda yis don sprad dgos pa'i slob ma la ni //
NK103(pe)017:299: rgyud smin pa 'bras ming dang ma smin pa'i bye brag gnyis te //
NK103(pe)017:300: chu shing la snying po med pas de lta bu'i slob ma ni //
NK103(pe)017:301: gting nas chos dang bla ma la dad pa dang
NK103(pe)017:302: 'dun pa dang mos gus dang bral ba dang dgra
NK103(pe)017:304: rkyen gyis mi 'jug pa'i dbang med par chos la 'jug pa'i tshul can de la //
NK103(pe)017:305: snying po 'bras bu med pas snod khas bub yin no //
NK103(pe)017:306: me tog dkar po la rtsa ba dang dri zhan pa de la lta bu'i slob ma ni //
NK103(pe)017:307: dad pa dang ldan kyang nan tan ka dang brtson kha'grus dang bral bas //
NK103(pe)017:308: dad pa yal bar 'gyur te rtsa ba kadang dri zhan pa ni snod zhabs rdol //
NK103(pe)017:309: tsan+dana dri bzang ba de lta bu slob ma'i dad pa dang brtson 'grus can //
NK103(pe)017:310: brtse gdung dam tshig dang bral bas snod gzhog ral yin //
NK103(pe)017:311: ga pur sman dug tu ma nges pa lta bu blo phyogs gcig tu ma nges pa ste //
NK103(pe)017:312: gzhan gyi rkyen dang gang 'phrad kyi phyogs su 'dres pas //
NK103(pe)017:313: shes rab kyis bye brag ma phyed pa ni snod dug can yin no //
NK103(pe)017:314: snod skyon de dag dang ma bral ba'i gang zag 'ga' 'gas kyang rang dang gzhan gyi don du //
NK103(pe)017:315: 'bras bu smin par nus pa ni dka' bar gnas so //
NK103(pe)017:316: smin pa'i slob ma rin chen ni sems kyi rang bzhin gyis //
NK103(pe)017:317: rigs kyi dbye ba rgyud shes rab kyi dbang po
NK103(pe)017:318: rnon pos sngar ma sbyangs par chig chod rtogs nus
NK103(pe)017:319: pa'am dam // sngar sbyangs pa'i las 'phro can gnyis gang yang rung ste //
NK103(pe)017:320: dad 0 pa dang brtson 4'grus dang brtse 6gdung dang yon tan no //
NK103(pe)017:322: gzhi 0brtan pa ni grogs bzang ste dam tshig dang ldan te //
NK103(pe)017:324: don rtogs byed las shing bla ma'i man ngag len pa dang //
NK103(pe)017:325: bdag dang gzhan gyi don rdzogs par byed pa yin //
NK103(pe)017:326: dri dang nus pas nges par smin pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:327: don nges pa'i thabs man ngag gi don bstan pa dang ni gang zhe na /
NK103(pe)017:328: ngo bo dang nges tshig dang ldang ba'i tshad dang //
NK103(pe)017:329: rtsom pa'i 1tshad dang de yi rgyu 1dang //
NK103(pe)017:330: dpe dang yon tan dang bral ba'i skyon dang rnam grangs //
NK103(pe)017:331: bzhi tshan gnyis gcig gis bzlog ste bstan pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:332: mngon par rtogs 0byed dang de kho na nyid ston pa'i man ngag go //
NK103(pe)017:333: snga 0ba theg pa bye brag rang sa ston pa spyi'i 1grub mtha' ston pa //
NK103(pe)017:334: rgyud kyi don 'grel t+aika spyi 1dang bye brag 1 kha yar 1111la //
NK103(pe)017:335: 'jug pa tha dad pa ni mngon par rtogs byed kyi yan lag yin //
NK103(pe)017:336: de kho na nyid ston pa'i man ngag gi klong dgu las //
NK103(pe)017:337: gter gtad chu rgyun spyi 1dang bye 1brag gzhung re rer 1bsdus rgyas 1so //
NK103(pe)017:338: man ngag dang bral na chos nyid rang rig pa'i mngon sum du rtogs par dka' la //
NK103(pe)017:339: chos nyid blo'i yul du byed pa ni ngo bo'i
NK103(pe)017:340: spros pa yin pas don spyi'i rnam pa tsam mo
NK103(pe)017:341: // yon tan ni skyon de las bzlog pa ste dka' ba spyod pa'i tshegs dang bral bas //
NK103(pe)017:342: dgos pa'i don chen po gzhan gyis dpag par dka' ba'i rang snang mngon sum du rtogs pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:343: dper na gser 'gyur gyi rtsi yis ma ki ta yi snum bskus pa las //
NK103(pe)017:344: zangs 1 lcags gser du 'gyur ba dang dug sman
NK103(pe)017:345: du bsgyur ba dang gyong po bkol bar bde ba
NK103(pe)017:346: dang // man ngag rtsom pa'i rgyu ni rtsa nus
NK103(pe)017:347: pa'i shes rab dang gzhan phan snying rje 'dzom pa
NK103(pe)017:348: dang // ste // rgyal ba'i lung dang bla ma'i man ngag thob pas 'bras bu brtsam pa 'grub //
NK103(pe)017:349: gnas lugs rang gi mtshan nyid mngon sum du rtogs pa ni rtsom pa'i tshad rab //
NK103(pe)017:351: lung bstan rtsoms shig par thob pa ni 'bring po yin //
NK103(pe)017:352: rang rang gi grub mtha' la zlo ba dang gzhan
NK103(pe)017:353: gyi grub mtha' shan 'byed pa'i bka' lung gi tshig
NK103(pe)017:354: la mkhas shing // theg pa'i bye brag phyed pa ni tha ma yin no //
NK103(pe)017:355: yi ge a'i sgra dang cha las btags pa a
NK103(pe)017:356: l+ai ka l+ai rnams 'dus pa las ngo bo mtshon
NK103(pe)017:358: de 'dus pa las khyad par mtshon pa'i tshig de
NK103(pe)017:359: 'dus pa las don la 'jug ldog ston pa'i ngag
NK103(pe)017:360: de las dgos pa'i don rdzogs pa'i man ngag 'grub
NK103(pe)017:361: bo // gron tshegs dang bral ba'i thabs chen po dag gyis //
NK103(pe)017:362: brtags pa'i gzhan gyis dpag par dka' ba'i don chen po gnas lugs rtogs shing //
NK103(pe)017:363: thugs las brgyud pas man ngag yin no //
NK103(pe)017:366: rang sems nyid rang rig pa'i mngon sum du rtogs pa'o mo //
NK103(pe)017:367: man ngag gi ngo bo de yang klong dgu rang snang gcig gi yul te //
NK103(pe)017:368: dbang gi klong dang dkyil 'khor gyi dang dam tshig dang //
NK103(pe)017:369: phrin las kyi dang rtogs tshad dang goms byed dang spyod pa'i dang //
NK103(pe)017:370: sa dang lam gyi klong brgyad po lam gyi skabs 'dir lus rnam par bzhag go //
NK103(pe)017:371: 'og ma ltar phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pa'i
NK103(pe)017:372: rim pas khabskur bas thob pa min kyang 'dir rig
NK103(pe)017:374: rang gi sems rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir shor ba ni //
NK103(pe)017:375: rtsol med kyi bde ba chen po'i dgongs pa yul med rang gsal du //
NK103(pe)017:376: dbang du 'dus pa'i phyir na dbang gi ming don nges pa'i tshig tu'o //
NK103(pe)017:377: sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis nyen pa las grol te bde bar gnas pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:378: dbang gi dgos ched dang yon tan gnyis mdor bsdus pa yin no //
NK103(pe)017:379: mngon sum du snang ba nyid kyi ye shes la //
NK103(pe)017:380: sangs rgyas dang sems can la khyad med kyang //
NK103(pe)017:381: rang dbang rang gi sems la mi gnas pa //
NK103(pe)017:382: bde ba chen po rang rig pa'i mngon sum du spyod mi nus pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:383: rang gzhan gnyis kas ngo ma shes te brda don dang bral ba'i rgyal dwa'u ru 'khyams pa de //
NK103(pe)017:384: nor bu'i sa nas rgyal po'i sar bton pas //
NK103(pe)017:385: dpung gi yan lag rta shing rta glang mi ring bzhi la dbang byed pa bzhin no //
NK103(pe)017:386: cho ga'i rim pas bskur bas thob pa dang rig pa rtsal gyis 'thob //
NK103(pe)017:387: gdul bya so so blo dang 'tsham tshad du bstan pas grangs med do //
NK103(pe)017:388: ye nas gnas 1pa'i dbang ni dang rgyal thabs spyi blugs kyi dbang 1ni //
NK103(pe)017:389: rtogs par bya ba'i don dang rtogs par byed pa'i thabs so //
NK103(pe)017:390: rtsol bas bskur du med pa ni srog dang ldan te rang la rdzogs pa'i //
NK103(pe)017:391: gdeng chen po dang ldan pa des na rtsol ba med pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:392: dbang bskur las kyi rim pa yis de nyid bskur ba'i thabs bstan pa //
NK103(pe)017:393: yang sprul dpa' bo nyid kyis dbang klong las /
NK103(pe)017:394: dang po'i yan lag bstan bya ba //
NK103(pe)017:395: gnas dang da la slob dpon dang //
NK103(pe)017:396: slob ma dag dang 'jug rim dang //
NK103(pe)017:397: dus dang 'jug pa'i yon tan no //
NK103(pe)017:399: ngo bo kadang nges tshig dang dgos ched dang //
NK103(pe)017:400: yon tan dang skyon dang mtshon pa'i dpe dang //
NK103(pe)017:401: rnam grangs dang gdeng srog dang bskur ba'i thabs dang //
NK103(pe)017:402: bzhi tshan gnyis dang gcig ste dgu yis rdzogs pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:403: ga dkyil 'khor gyi dbye ba dang gdeng srog dang //
NK103(pe)017:405: rnam pa gnyis grangs kyis bstan pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:406: ming 'gro 'dul rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nyid dang //
NK103(pe)017:407: rang bzhin rnam dag phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK103(pe)017:408: snga ma la phyi gzugs brnyan nang rtsa gnas bzhi gsang ba pad+ma ste //
NK103(pe)017:409: bcos ma'i dbang bskur rnams gzhi de la brten nas 'jug pa'i sa'o //
NK103(pe)017:410: rang bzhin rnam dag ni rang rig pa nyid gong
NK103(pe)017:411: gi dkyil 'khor de dag kun gyi rang bzhin no
NK103(pe)017:412: // yul drug dang dbang po drug po bde ba chen po'i dal drug tu rnam par dag pas //
NK103(pe)017:413: yul dbang rang ga ma'i mtshan ma 'jil ba'i lha yab yum gyi sku mi gnas te //
NK103(pe)017:414: dus gdod ma nas don mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:415: 'khor mtha' na gnas pa dang gtso bo dbus na gnas pa dang bral ba'i srog la gnas //
NK103(pe)017:416: 'khor 'das thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rig pa ni gdeng chen no //
NK103(pe)017:417: snying po don gyi rang bzhin len pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor te //
NK103(pe)017:418: rnam rtog gcod cing rtogs goms rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir 'khor lo'o //
NK103(pe)017:419: gtso bo'i dbus su bkod cing 'khor gyis mtha' nas
NK103(pe)017:420: bskor ba ni gdul bya drang ba'i thabs su bstan
NK103(pe)017:421: la // 'dir thun mong ma yin kyang thun mong ba kun gyi bdag nyid yin no //
NK103(pe)017:422: dam tshig gi dbye ba dang gdeng srog dang //
NK103(pe)017:423: nges tshig dang skyon dang yon tan dang srung ba'i thabs so //
NK103(pe)017:424: rnam pa dbye ba la gnyis ni rtogs goms kyi gdeng dang ldan pas lhag spyod du //
NK103(pe)017:425: 'og ma'i 'dul sdom dam tshig rnams grangs kyis btab ste 'dir bsrung ba dang //
NK103(pe)017:426: grangs su btab nas srung ba'i rtsol ba dang bral rang rig rtogs pa'i dam tshig go //
NK103(pe)017:427: srung ba'i dam tshig gi klong du dpa' bo dga' rab kyis bshad //
NK103(pe)017:428: rtsol bas bsrung du med pa ni dam tshig gi srog la //
NK103(pe)017:429: bsrung du med pa lhun gnas kyi ngang la gnas pa na //
NK103(pe)017:430: nyams kyis dogs pa ka nas dag ste mi 'byung ba ni dam tshig gi gdeng yin no //
NK103(pe)017:431: gnas lugs byang chub kyi sems nyid skyon thams cad las grol ba dam pa'i don de //
NK103(pe)017:432: de'i ngang la gnas 1pa'i ngang mi gnas 1pa'i khyad 11par las //
NK103(pe)017:433: rnam 1par rtog dang rang 1rgyud sreg 11pa'i phyir na //
NK103(pe)017:434: dam tshig ces su yang sprul dpa' bos gsungs //
NK103(pe)017:435: dam tshig la mi gnas pa'i rdo rje sngags pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:436: bka' dang rgyud kyi tshig don la mkhas kyang rdo rje dmyal bar ltung //
NK103(pe)017:437: mkhas pas lhungs pa de las mi skyob par dpa' bos bshad do //
NK103(pe)017:438: skyon de las bzlog pa ni yon tan nyid du 'gyur ba ste //
NK103(pe)017:439: dam tshig ni dgos 'dod 'byung bas yid sbyin gyi nor bu rin po che dang //
NK103(pe)017:440: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la pha rol tu sgrol ba'i gru dang 'dra //
NK103(pe)017:441: duhkha'i mtshon las skyob pa rdo rje'i go /
NK103(pe)017:442: ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bas nyi ma lta bur bshad //
NK103(pe)017:443: srung thabs lhag spyod grangs btab ni theg pa 'og ma nas bshad pa bzhin du bsrung te //
NK103(pe)017:444: rtsol bral gyi nam mkha' lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas ni //
NK103(pe)017:445: lta ba rtogs pa'i so las gzhag thabs gsum gyis mi 'da' bar bsrung ste //
NK103(pe)017:446: rang rig pa'i don la 'da' ba med pa ni dam tshig srung ba'i mchog ste //
NK103(pe)017:447: phyogs dang grangs dang bral bas med pa 'dzin pa
NK103(pe)017:448: dang bral bas phyal ba dbyer med pas gcig pu
NK103(pe)017:449: dang // rtsol ba med pas lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig dang bzhi'i ngang la gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:450: phrin las kyi ngo bo dang nges tshig dang //
NK103(pe)017:451: dbye ba dang gdeng srog dang bya thabs dang 'bras bu'o //
NK103(pe)017:452: ngo bo ni ye shes rnam pa lnga po nyid kyi rol pa //
NK103(pe)017:453: 'gag pa med pa gdul bya'i don grub mdzad pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:454: gsung du brjod cing don la basngagasa pa brjod pas gdul bya'i don rdzogs pa'i phrin //
NK103(pe)017:455: spyod cing dang du len phyir las zhes bya 'o //
NK103(pe)017:457: rtogs goms kyi gdeng chen po dang ldan pas phrin las zhi rgyas dbang drag bzhi brtsam pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:458: theg pa rang rang gi gzhung gdul bya'i don du kun sgrub pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:459: rang bzhin lhun grub kyi phrin las ni //
NK103(pe)017:460: ye shes rang snang du rtogs pa'i ngang la gnas pas //
NK103(pe)017:461: phyi gzung ba dang nang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad rang gi ngang gis zhi //
NK103(pe)017:462: ye shes mtha' dang dbus med par khyab pas rgyas //
NK103(pe)017:463: 'khor 'das thams cad byang chub sems kyi ngang du dbang du 'dus pas dbang //
NK103(pe)017:464: phyi nang gi rnam par rtog pa tshar bcad cing
NK103(pe)017:465: bsgral bas drag po'i phrin las dang bzhi rang bzhin
NK103(pe)017:467: bya btsal gyi rtsol sgrub med pa srog gi gnas la //
NK103(pe)017:468: las bzhi ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i gdeng chen po dang ldan no //
NK103(pe)017:469: a ti'i don 'dir rtogs pa'i gdeng rnyed pa'i rnal 'byor bas //
NK103(pe)017:470: sreg pa me dang gdab pa mchod rten dang lu gu rgyud bro'i las gang byed kyang //
NK103(pe)017:475: sh+ain+tampush+timwashamku ru a b+hi tsa ra m+aa ra ya sngags
NK103(pe)017:476: dang 'dug stangs dang bca' ba'i phyag rgyas las bzhi
NK103(pe)017:477: so sor mthun par sbyar nas //
NK103(pe)017:478: 'gro 'dul thugs rje bya ba'am yang na rang bzhin lhun grub rtsol bas mi bya bar //
NK103(pe)017:479: thabs chen po gcig gis gdul bya'i don rdzogs par bya'o //
NK103(pe)017:480: bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud la bsgrub bya'i don dgra zhi /
NK103(pe)017:485: phrin las kyi 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:488: las de dag dang ldan pas dbang bskur bas //
NK103(pe)017:489: dbang thob pa'i tshad ni 'khor 'das thams cad rang
NK103(pe)017:490: dbang du 'dus nas brda bral stong nyid rang grol
NK103(pe)017:491: shar ba'i ni lta ba yin ste //
NK103(pe)017:492: de'i ngo bo dang nges tshig dang mtshan nyid dang //
NK103(pe)017:493: dbye ba dang gdeng srog dang nyams kyis mdor bstan no //
NK103(pe)017:494: thos bsam sgom pa rnam pa gsum gyi shes rab kyis yul med rang gsal du rtogs bas //
NK103(pe)017:495: 'khor 'das thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rig pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:496: blta bar bya ba'i yul dang byed pa'i yul can gnyis dang bral nas //
NK103(pe)017:497: yul med rang gsal gyi ngang du chos kun mthong ba'i phyir lta ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
NK103(pe)017:498: phyogs su mtshon pas 'di 'dra ba yin ces pa rang sar grol nas //
NK103(pe)017:499: rang rig pa mkhyen pa'i nyi ma kun tu khyab la ma 'dres par //
NK103(pe)017:500: rang snang ba ni kun tu bzang po'i thugs nyid do //
NK103(pe)017:501: brdar btags pa'i tshig tsam la rab tu brten nas de ma yin las log pa'i //
NK103(pe)017:502: ldog pa dang bcas pa'i lta ba ni //
NK103(pe)017:503: rigs drug dngos po rang ka ma rtag pa ther
NK103(pe)017:504: mu stegs zug chad lta snga phyi'i mu chad pa
NK103(pe)017:505: dang // gzung nyan ba rdul 'dzin pa skad cig
NK103(pe)017:506: ma rten rang 'brel du rtogs la 'dzin pa skad
NK103(pe)017:507: cig ma ste chos tsam du lta ba dang //
NK103(pe)017:508: snang ba kun rdzob dang mi snang ba don dam
NK103(pe)017:509: bden pa gnyis dbu ma pa su lta ba dang
NK103(pe)017:510: // kun rdzob lha rigs gsum bzhi lnga yi dkyil
NK103(pe)017:511: phyi pa 'khor dang don dam par stong par lta
NK103(pe)017:512: // ba dang // thabs 1'gag med dang shes 1ma
NK103(pe)017:513: h+aa rab 1rang bzhin med pa gnyis bde 1ba dang
NK103(pe)017:514: stong 1pa dbyer med du lta ba dang //
NK103(pe)017:515: yul chos kyi dbyings dang sems a nu rig pa'i
NK103(pe)017:516: ye shes 'du 'bral med dang sras bde ba chen
NK103(pe)017:517: por lta ba ste de dag bstan pa'i dgos pa
NK103(pe)017:518: ni 'di nyid kyi don la rim gyis drangs ba'o
NK103(pe)017:519: // go byed kyi brda dang bral ba'i byang chub kyi sems su rang grol bar rgyas btab pas //
NK103(pe)017:520: re zhig dgos ched kyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub pa dang ma bcos pa cir btags kyang //
NK103(pe)017:521: rnam rtog rang grol gdags gzhi can //
NK103(pe)017:522: ngo bo'i rjes su ming nges pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:523: rnam rtog dang kun rdzob ngan par mi dgag la //
NK103(pe)017:524: don dam dang ye shes bzang bar bsgrub tu med pas srog /
NK103(pe)017:525: dbyer med nyag gcig gi don la 'khor 'das gnyis su brjod kyang //
NK103(pe)017:526: bzang ngan gyi ris su ma grub pa ni gdeng chen no //
NK103(pe)017:527: de yang dang po rnal ma'i ming la mos pa skyes pas ni g.yo ba'i nyams //
NK103(pe)017:528: tug phrad gsum gyis brda don sbrad pas thob pa'i nyams yin //
NK103(pe)017:529: ma nor bar ston pa'i rang gi sems kyi slob dpon la //
NK103(pe)017:530: lta ba'i lung 1nod dran 1pa1sa 1thag 1gcad nas de'i ngang du goms 1pa'i nyams //
NK103(pe)017:531: som nyi the tshom dang yin du re ba dang
NK103(pe)017:532: min du dogs pa'i phyogs ris dang bral ba ni
NK103(pe)017:533: // rtogs pa mthar phyin pa'i nyams grub pa yin no //
NK103(pe)017:534: rtogs par byed pa'i yan lag gi klong bzhi rtogs pa rang dang //
NK103(pe)017:535: bcas pa nyid du bstan pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:536: goms par byed pa'i yan lag gi klong gnyis goms pa de nyid rang dang bcas pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:537: ngo bo dang nges tshig dang dbye ba dang //
NK103(pe)017:538: gdeng srog dang gzhag thabs dang skyon ngos gzung ba dang de bcos pa'i thabs dang //
NK103(pe)017:539: nyams rim bzhi'i rtags la thun mong gnyis dang //
NK103(pe)017:541: rang bzhin gyi snang ba rang rig mngon sum du rtogs pa yi //
NK103(pe)017:542: ngang las ma yengs rang sar gzhag 'jog med par gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:543: byang chub kyi sems nyid ye nas kun khyab tu gdal ba'i //
NK103(pe)017:544: klong du goms par byed pa'i phyir ni ming goms thabs su nges pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:545: chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid mngon sum du ma rig pa'i //
NK103(pe)017:546: dmigs pa gtad pas don spyi yi rnam pa tsam yid la gsal ba ni //
NK103(pe)017:547: blo yis yul du sgom pa'i sgom pa zhes bya ba dang //
NK103(pe)017:548: rang rig pas chos nyid yul med par mngon sum du rtogs pas //
NK103(pe)017:549: blo ma gtad kyang de'i ngang las ma yengs par rang gsal ba ni //
NK103(pe)017:550: blos yul du ma bsgoms kyang yengs pa med pa'i don gyis ma yengs pa la bsgom zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)017:551: de ltar rnam pa gnyis su dbye te de dag gi bye brag gi rnam grangs ni //
NK103(pe)017:552: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lugs mang po yod do //
NK103(pe)017:553: blos bsgom du med pa ni bsgom pa'i srog la //
NK103(pe)017:554: chos thams cad de kho na nyid rang snang ba las yengs pa med pas //
NK103(pe)017:555: yengs su med pa ni bsgom pa'i gdengs ste yengs
NK103(pe)017:556: pa'i sel med pa ni dper na rin chen gyi
NK103(pe)017:557: gling nas rdo'i sel med pa bzhin no //
NK103(pe)017:558: bla ma drin can gyi gdams ngag gis chos nyid
NK103(pe)017:559: mngon sum du yul med rang gsal bar rtogs pa'i
NK103(pe)017:560: // so las ma yengs par dran pas zung zhig /
NK103(pe)017:561: mi mthun pa'i rnam rtog ci skyes kyang de'i rang bzhin chos nyid du lhun grub 0pas //
NK103(pe)017:562: spong byed kyi gnyen pos de mi 'gag par rang tang du zhog cig /
NK103(pe)017:563: des 0na 'bras bu thob tu re ba dang ma
NK103(pe)017:564: thob tu dogs pa'i skyes lugs gsum ya ngan gyi
NK103(pe)017:565: sku gsum du rtsol sgrub dang bral bas rtsol bas
NK103(pe)017:566: ma btsal bar lhug par gnas par bya'o //
NK103(pe)017:567: bying 1dang rgod 1pa'i 11skyon 'byung ba de dag gang zhe na /
NK103(pe)017:568: thog ma mun pa'i bag chags dang /
NK103(pe)017:569: bcud zas drags dang gnas gos 'thibs /
NK103(pe)017:570: bad kan rgyas dang ngal dub drags /
NK103(pe)017:571: zhes pa'i bying ba nad gzhi'i dang rkyen de dag 'dus pas //
NK103(pe)017:572: rig pa mi gsal bar mun gyis non pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:573: gdams pa zhan dang sbyangs pa chung bas rmugs pas
NK103(pe)017:574: shes bya'i don mi gsal bas rgya ma chod de
NK103(pe)017:575: // dang po'i shes par bya ba'i gzhi lung du ma bstan pas //
NK103(pe)017:576: yid bde zhing mi rtog pa'i rtsal yin kyang //
NK103(pe)017:577: rtogs pas lung du ma bstan pas gzhan gyi rkyen dbang du 'gyur ba'o //
NK103(pe)017:578: rgod pa ni shes pa skye ba'i lugs gsum yin te //
NK103(pe)017:579: sgo lnga yul la mtshan mar 'dzin pa ni yul gyi bdud la //
NK103(pe)017:580: yid snga phyi'i rjes su spros pa sna tshogs su gcod pa ni /
NK103(pe)017:582: nyon yid nga bdag tu 'dzin pa ni nang gi
NK103(pe)017:583: bdud ngo shes kyang de'i ngang la mi gnas pa
NK103(pe)017:585: de dag gis dngos grub rnal ma'i bar du gcod pas bdud ces bya'o //
NK103(pe)017:586: skyon de dag bcos pa'i thabs bstan pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:587: dbang po rab la skyon gyis mi gnod la skyon 'byung yang mi srid pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:588: ngo shes pa dang goms pa dang skyon bcos pa dang nyams rnams chig chod du 'byung pas //
NK103(pe)017:589: dper na yang sprul bdag 'dra nges par byung na chig chod yin /
NK103(pe)017:592: de bas blo zhan pa dbang po 'bring ngam tha ma'i skyon bcos thabs la //
NK103(pe)017:593: bying ba la g.yo 'dzin rlung gis gzer btab ste gzengs bstod la /
NK103(pe)017:594: mthun 111 pa'i gnas bsil sar bsdad zas 1bsil rtsub yang bas khams bsnyam spyod 1lam khrus bya /
NK103(pe)017:597: phung po snyoms pa de rnams 111bsten //
NK103(pe)017:598: dper na sgron mas rdzas gzhan gsal bar byas la //
NK103(pe)017:599: sgron ma nyid kyang nyid kyis gsal bar byas kyang //
NK103(pe)017:600: de'i rjes su rtog pa cung zad med pa bzhin no //
NK103(pe)017:601: rmugs pa dang rgod pa'i bdud skye lugs gsum bcos thabs ni //
NK103(pe)017:602: bzhag thabs rang tang gong du bstan pa nyid yin te //
NK103(pe)017:603: rang tang de yis rmugs rgod de bcos pa yi bya ba rdzogs so //
NK103(pe)017:604: kha la khyer te don la mi gnas pa ni g.yeng ba'i bdud //
NK103(pe)017:605: ma nor nges pa'i bla ma la brtse gdung dam tshig bral ba yin pas //
NK103(pe)017:606: de ni rdo rje dmyal ba'i khab tu ltung bas //
NK103(pe)017:607: rang sems dpa' bo rang gis sun mi dbyung //
NK103(pe)017:608: kye bod pa ho dgyes pa rang la legs par chor la shod //
NK103(pe)017:609: gzhan la dri ba'i don smra ba'i yul min //
NK103(pe)017:610: sngar rang ni rang nyid bslus pas chog gis //
NK103(pe)017:611: da phyin chad ni 'jig rten gyi bya ba ci la'ang ma gtogs dang //
NK103(pe)017:612: des ni rang gzhan kun gyi don sgrub pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:613: nyams rim bzhi las rtags 'byung ba'i yan lag re
NK103(pe)017:614: re la ngo bo dpe rtags 'bras bu bzhi bzhi
NK103(pe)017:615: ni // yang sprul dpa' bos pra khrid du gsungs pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:616: gnas pa dang mi g.yo ba gnyis ni shes bya thun mong gi nyams la //
NK103(pe)017:617: mnyam nyid dang ye shes lhun grub gnyis ni khyad par 'dir nyid kyi nyams su shes par bya'o //
NK103(pe)017:618: lta sgom dang ldan pa'i grogs spyod pa la //
NK103(pe)017:619: ngo bo dang dbye ba dang gdeng srog dang gsum gyis ston pa yin //
NK103(pe)017:620: lus ngag yid kyi bya ba ci byed pa dag /
NK103(pe)017:621: rtogs goms kyi srog dang ldan par don bzhi grub par spyad pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:622: blang dor can gyi spyod pa dang de nyid dang bral ba'i spyod pa //
NK103(pe)017:623: rnam pa gnyis su rgyud las gsungs pa yin //
NK103(pe)017:624: blang ba dang dor ba rang gi ngo bos rnal ma'i don la mi gnas pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:625: ma bcos pas nam mkha' rdo rje'i spyod pa yin no //
NK103(pe)017:626: gzhan don du blang dor ltar snang yang don gyis mi gnas pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:627: 'gro ba cis 'dul ba dang 'tshams par thugs rje'i spyod pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:628: mthun pa blang zhing mi mthun pa dor du med pa ni spyod pa'i srog ste //
NK103(pe)017:629: dkar spyod dge ba dang nag spyod mi dge ba
NK103(pe)017:630: byang sems ngang du gnas pa la rnam pa sgyu
NK103(pe)017:631: ma der mnyam par gnas pas //
NK103(pe)017:632: de ltar mnyam pa'i don rtogs pa'i gdeng chen po nyid la longs spyod pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:633: rtogs goms kyi ngang la gnas 1dang pa ni blo 'jug pas 0sa 1lam 0 ste //
NK103(pe)017:634: ngo bo dang nges tshig dang dbye ba dang //
NK103(pe)017:636: de la ngo bo ni byang chub kyi sems nyid rtogs pa'i //
NK103(pe)017:637: ngang la gnas shing mthar phyin par 'jug pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:638: yon tan tshogs kyi gzhir gnas shing rten byed pas sa zhes grags //
NK103(pe)017:639: de la blo 'jug pa'i phyir na lam nyid do //
NK103(pe)017:640: sa sbyangs shing lam bgrod du yod par 'dod pas bsti gnas kyis ste //
NK103(pe)017:641: dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa //
NK103(pe)017:648: dgra bcom pa'i sa dang nyan sa brgyad las nyon
NK103(pe)017:649: mongs pa thob pa 'gog pa'i bden pa thob par
NK103(pe)017:650: 'jug go // sa byang bcu dang pha rol tu phyin pa bcur sbyar //
NK103(pe)017:657: shes rab ring du song ba /
NK103(pe)017:660: smon lam chos kyi sprin no //
NK103(pe)017:662: de dag gis sgrib pa gnyis sbyangs nas kun tu 'od kyi ye shes 'char //
NK103(pe)017:663: kri ya rigs gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa dang
NK103(pe)017:664: yo ga rigs lnga stug po bkod pa'i sa dang
NK103(pe)017:665: // u pa ya rigs bzhi rdo rje 'chang ba'i
NK103(pe)017:666: sa dang ma h+aa'i ma chags pad+ma spyan gyi sa
NK103(pe)017:667: // dang // a nu'i yi ge 'khor lo tshogs
NK103(pe)017:668: chen dang kun tu bzang po dbye ba med pa'i
NK103(pe)017:669: // dang // sa dang // de dag thams cad
NK103(pe)017:670: kyis mi mthun phyogs sgrib pa spangs nas thob pa
NK103(pe)017:671: // dang // sa dang // yin no // mtshan
NK103(pe)017:672: nyid theg chen gyi lam lnga las tshogs lam dang
NK103(pe)017:673: sbyor lam gnyis su zhi gnas la goms pas lam
NK103(pe)017:675: lhag mthong gsal ba'i ye shes la mthong lam dang sgom lam du mthar lam du sgom mo //
NK103(pe)017:676: nang pa'i rim 0par dang cig car 0ba gnyis thabs
NK103(pe)017:677: 0kyis nges pa'i lam dang shes 0rab kyis grol ba'i
NK103(pe)017:678: lam / bskyed 0 pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim par lam bgrod pa yin //
NK103(pe)017:679: kri ya pa'i lus ngag gi las dang bya ba
NK103(pe)017:680: gtsor byed pa'i lam dang bsam gtan gtsor byed pa'i
NK103(pe)017:681: lam dang // u pa ya bya ba dang ting
NK103(pe)017:682: 'dzin gnyi ga'i mthu las te de dag ltar du
NK103(pe)017:684: ye nas rdzogs pas ma bcos gong na med pas
NK103(pe)017:685: bla ma'i ji bzhin nyid du gnas pas sa 'jug
NK103(pe)017:686: pas lam ni // rtogs pas ma sbyangs shing ma bcos pas bla ma'i sa'o //
NK103(pe)017:687: 'og nas gong du ma bgrod par cig car du 'jug pa yis lam yin //
NK103(pe)017:688: sgrib pa sbyangs la gong du bgrod du med pa ni sa'i lam gyi srog /
NK103(pe)017:689: dang po 'jug ye shes gsang ba las //
NK103(pe)017:690: skal ldan dang po 'jug pa nas //
NK103(pe)017:691: mthar phyin pa la khyad par med //
NK103(pe)017:693: dang mthar thug don gcig ste khyad med pas //
NK103(pe)017:694: ye nas non pas ni sa lam gyi gdeng yin no //
NK103(pe)017:695: goms par byed pa'i yan lag gi klong gnyis dang goms thabs rang dang bcas par bstan pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:696: dbang klong la sogs pa ming tha dad gis kakhyad
NK103(pe)017:697: ga par don khagcig pa la mi 'dra ba'i dgu
NK103(pe)017:698: ru bstan ngapa yin gyis don la tha dad du
NK103(pe)017:699: gnas pa ni blos mi brtag go //
NK103(pe)017:700: rtogs pa de yi ngang la goms pas gnas pa la //
NK103(pe)017:701: phyi dgra bgegs dang nang skye lugs gsum gyi bar chod kyi bdud 'byung ba ni //
NK103(pe)017:702: dper na rin chen la sogs pa'i nor dang ldan pa la //
NK103(pe)017:703: mi rgod rku 'phrog la sogs rtsol bas 'jug pa dang 'dra'o //
NK103(pe)017:704: de la thun mong gi srung ba ni bka' bzhin
NK103(pe)017:705: gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i skyabs su gsang bdag gis
NK103(pe)017:706: sngon bzhag pa'i // dam shod gling gi dur khrod
NK103(pe)017:707: na gnas pa'i ma mo gsum dam can sde gsum
NK103(pe)017:708: sngon bzhag pa'i // la // mthun pa'i rdzas dang rten rnams bsogs te phyi 1nang 2gsang 3ba yi //
NK103(pe)017:709: srog 123gi snying po'i gnas nas dgug 1dbyings nas bskul gnad du gzir 3bas //
NK103(pe)017:710: rnal 'byor pa rang nyid phyi 1dang nang 1dang gsang ba 1dang //
NK103(pe)017:711: mthar thug 1de kho na nyid kyi lha 1111yi nga rgyal bya'o //
NK103(pe)017:712: bar chad rang gi sems nyid du rtogs pas ni thun mong min pa'i srung ba'i yin te //
NK103(pe)017:713: dgra med par rtogs pa la zon chas ci byar yod //
NK103(pe)017:714: des na lta ba rtogs nas goms pas ma brtan pa'i //
NK103(pe)017:715: dang po'i las can bsrung bskrad kyi rig pa 'khor
NK103(pe)017:716: lo dang bcas pas bsrung zhing goms pa bskyang bar
NK103(pe)017:717: bya'o // don lam de dag mtshon par byed pa ni tshig gi lam ste //
NK103(pe)017:718: de'i dbye ba dang dgos ched dang che ba dang //
NK103(pe)017:719: 'byung ba'i dus dang byung ba'i tshul dang //
NK103(pe)017:720: de dag ji ltar bshad pa'i thabs so //
NK103(pe)017:721: sprul sku'i thugs las yang sprul pa gsang bdag gi
NK103(pe)017:722: thugs kyi sras 'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal ba'i dpa'
NK103(pe)017:723: bo yis // brjod bya'i don klong dgu la rjod byed bam po nyi khri yod pa la //
NK103(pe)017:724: sde tshan mi 'dra bas phal che bar gsum du phye ba ni //
NK103(pe)017:725: gol sa shan 'byed gyi chos su phal che ba rnams la //
NK103(pe)017:726: bram ze'i rgyud du ming mtshon pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:727: rang gzhung la bzla ba'i chos su phal che ba rnams la //
NK103(pe)017:728: rgyal po'i rgyud du ming mtshon pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:729: 'khrul pa rang grol cing chos nyid mngon sum du ston par byed pa'i tshig /
NK103(pe)017:730: man ngag gi rgyud du mtshon pa yin no //
NK103(pe)017:731: bram ze rtsa ba'i rgyud drug yod pa la //
NK103(pe)017:732: gol ka ba'i gzhi dang gol khaba dngos //
NK103(pe)017:733: de ngos ga'dzin pa dang sun ngadbyung ba dang rang cagzhung dang //
NK103(pe)017:734: spyi chayi rgyud du bstan pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:735: de dag gi dpe de ka yang bkru bar bya ba'i gzhi gdong pa la //
NK103(pe)017:736: bkru bar bya ba'i rgyu ni dri ma yin la ngos ga'dzin pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:737: mkhar sil gyi me long la de 'khrud par byed pa ni bum pa'i chu yis //
NK103(pe)017:738: bkrus pa'i yon tan rigs ca gtsang ba dang mdangs
NK103(pe)017:739: cha kyi kha dog gsal bar byed pa dang 'dra
NK103(pe)017:740: ba yin no // yan lag gi rgyud sde bcu
NK103(pe)017:741: tshan gsum dang rtsa drug ste zhe gnyis po de
NK103(pe)017:742: dag shan 'byed gyi chos su byung ba yin no
NK103(pe)017:743: ba yin no // // rgyal po rtsa ba'i rgyud lnga gsungs pa la //
NK103(pe)017:744: la bzla ba'i sa kani dang la bzla ba'i rgyu kha ni la zlo bar byed ga pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:745: la bzla nga ba'i thabs ni dang la bzlas pa'i cayon tan ni //
NK103(pe)017:746: mnga' karu bsdu sa ni bsdu khargyu ni dang //
NK103(pe)017:747: sdud ga par byed pa ni bsdu ngaba'i thabs ni mnga' ru bsdus pa'i yon catan dag /
NK103(pe)017:748: mnga' ka ris rnams la khamgo nag ste rgyal ga po nyid yin la //
NK103(pe)017:749: nga zhi ba'am drag pos mnga' ru sdud la mi nor la longs spyod pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:750: ka gzhi la dang khasnang grags kyi chos thams cad ste byang gachub kyi sems yin la //
NK103(pe)017:751: rgyal ba'i nga lung rang gi rigs pa bla ma'i man ngag rang cagrol bas la zlo la //
NK103(pe)017:752: rtsol med kyi bde ba chen por rang gsal ba yin no //
NK103(pe)017:753: sangs rgyas la sku dang gsung dang yon tan dang phrin las dang thugs dang lnga //
NK103(pe)017:754: mnga' ba'i rtsal du rgyud lnga byung ba yin //
NK103(pe)017:755: gcig la yang yan lag lnga lnga ste nyi shu rtsa lnga re re la //
NK103(pe)017:756: zhing dang sku dang thugs dang gsum mnga' ba'i rtsal las //
NK103(pe)017:757: sems can gyi yul dang lus dang yid dang gsum byung bas //
NK103(pe)017:758: de dag ston par byed pa'i ngag tu rgyud gsum gsum du byung bas //
NK103(pe)017:759: yon tan gyi ldog cha las rgyud sde bcu tshan bdun dang lnga ste //
NK103(pe)017:760: de dag dril bas brgya dang rtsa lnga ru shar ba yin no //
NK103(pe)017:761: man ngag la rtsa ba'i rgyud lnga la //
NK103(pe)017:762: gnas lugs dang 'khrul tshul dang de bstan pa'i thabs dang //
NK103(pe)017:763: goms par bya ba'i thabs dang spyir 'bras bu dang lnga //
NK103(pe)017:764: gtso che ba ru gang ston pa'i sgo nas rnam pa lngar phye la //
NK103(pe)017:765: re re la yan lag lnga lnga ste bcu tshan gnyis dang lngar byung ba ni //
NK103(pe)017:766: rtsa ba lus dang yan lag gi tshul yin no //
NK103(pe)017:767: tshig lam de yi dgos ched ni don gyi lam nyid //
NK103(pe)017:768: brda sprod 1par byed yid ches 1par byed mtshon par byed 1pa 111yin no //
NK103(pe)017:769: che ba ni zhen 1drug log 1gsum rtsol 1ba 111brgyad las0 //
NK103(pe)017:770: khyad par du 'phags par bstan pa yin ste //
NK103(pe)017:771: sdug 0basngala dang rtsol ba'i nad las bkrol bas //
NK103(pe)017:772: che ba lnga mdo bcu las /
NK103(pe)017:773: lnga gsum gcig gis 'phags pa yin //
NK103(pe)017:774: de yang gang dang gang zhe na //
NK103(pe)017:775: khyad par 'phags pa'i mdo dag la //
NK103(pe)017:777: gsum 'phags phun sum tshogs mdo las //
NK103(pe)017:778: phun sum tshogs pa gsum gyi 'phags //
NK103(pe)017:780: des na theg pa kun las 'phags //
NK103(pe)017:782: ston pa bstan pa 'khor gsum byang chub kyi sems gcig tu mtshon pa yin no //
NK103(pe)017:783: snying po rnal ma'i rgyud 'byung ba'i dus nyon mongs
NK103(pe)017:784: rgyud drag ces pa drug gter gtad du gsungs pa
NK103(pe)017:785: las // bstan pa'i snyigs ma dang grub mtha' ngan
NK103(pe)017:786: pas bsgyur ba'i log rtog mang ba'i dus gnyis su
NK103(pe)017:788: dad pa med pa dang bka' yi don la rton pa dang //
NK103(pe)017:789: nyon mongs pa rgyud drag pa dang gsum gyi dus su rgyal po'i rgyud kyis mnga' ru bsdus pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:790: man ngag gi rgyud ni spyir drug ka la gces kyang khyad par du tshe thung bas //
NK103(pe)017:791: bsgrub long med pa'i dus su gron tshogs chung bar bstan pa yin la //
NK103(pe)017:792: rgyud sde gsum po kun la dus drug po thams cad 'jug pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:793: rgyud byung ka ba'i tshul ni nyi ma'i snying po las //
NK103(pe)017:795: ngo bo nyid ma bcos par shar ba'i chos kyi sku yis //
NK103(pe)017:796: bdag po'i rkyen byas nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur snang 1ba //
NK103(pe)017:797: de 1las sprul sku sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang yon
NK103(pe)017:798: tan ma 'gags par yul lhan cig pa'i 'khor la
NK103(pe)017:799: shar ba de yang rang gi ngo bo dang byin
NK103(pe)017:801: shar ba'i yang sprul thugs sras kyis //
NK103(pe)017:802: tshig tu bsdeb pa'i sbyar ba legs par mdzad pa //
NK103(pe)017:803: de khalas mi lha klu gnod sbyin rig pa 'dzin pa bzhi rim par //
NK103(pe)017:804: smin nas ga bla ma dam pa dge slong chen po ku ku r+aa dza'i //
NK103(pe)017:805: thugs kyi 'od zer gyis sh+r+ai sing+ha bdag gi blo'i mun pa bsal //
NK103(pe)017:806: yi dam rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs
NK103(pe)017:807: pa'i mtha' yi mi bee ro tsa na khyod la
NK103(pe)017:808: gsal ba 'od mdzes pa rgyan rim pa phreng ba
NK103(pe)017:809: gsum brtsams pa ngas gtad kyis nan tan du chongs
NK103(pe)017:810: shig / de yang rgyal ba rnams dgongs kapa rig
NK103(pe)017:811: 'dzin rig khapa gang zag rnams snyan gakhung du brgyud
NK103(pe)017:812: shig / pa'o // rgyud sde de dag bshad pa'i thabs bstan pa ni gang zhe na /
NK103(pe)017:813: man ngag 'byung ba'i khungs lo rgyus kyi don dang //
NK103(pe)017:814: 'jug pa'i sgo theg pa rnams kyi bsdu ba yo ga'i don dang //
NK103(pe)017:815: rten gyi gang zag gang gi dgos pa'i don dang //
NK103(pe)017:816: dril nas mtshan du gsol ba rtsa ba'i don dang //
NK103(pe)017:817: dbu zhabs kyi dkyus bshad pa tshig gi don dang //
NK103(pe)017:818: spyi don rnam pa lnga yi thabs kyis bshad pa yin no //
NK103(pe)017:819: chos sku byin gyis rlabs kyi lo rgyus dang longs sku rang gi ngo bo'i dang //
NK103(pe)017:820: sprul sku tshig bsdeb sbyar ba legs pa'i lo rgyus la //
NK103(pe)017:821: dang po byin gyi rlabs ni chos kyi skus skye med don gyi go brda sprod pas gsungs //
NK103(pe)017:822: ngag tu brjod du med kyang don ye nas lhun
NK103(pe)017:823: gyis grub pa'i byin gyis sna tshogs su mi 'gag
NK103(pe)017:825: dpon slob tha dad snang yang don gyis mi gnyis
NK103(pe)017:826: cing snyan khung brgyud pa can gyi man ngag gis
NK103(pe)017:827: tha snyad dang bral ba'i don mtshon par byed pa'o
NK103(pe)017:828: // bla ma nges pa'i man ngag tshad las chos
NK103(pe)017:829: nyid rang gi mtshan nyid mngon sum par ston pa
NK103(pe)017:830: // ste // de yang rgyal ba lnga rig 'dzin bzhi /
NK103(pe)017:831: rgya bod kyi gang zag tu brgyud pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:832: nyid gzhan longs skus thugs kyi dgongs pa dang sku brda'i gsung gi sgo nas //
NK103(pe)017:833: rang gi ngo bos bshad pas chos nyid rang shar du mtshon //
NK103(pe)017:834: rang gi ngo bos mi gnyis shing dbyer med pa'i ma nor nges pa'i slob dpon //
NK103(pe)017:835: brda'i rtog pa dang bral ba'i stong nyid rang grol ba'i man ngag rang rig pa'i nyams tshad ma //
NK103(pe)017:836: chos nyid rang mtshan yul med rang shar du go ba'o //
NK103(pe)017:837: cir yang sprul pa'i sku thub pa'i dbang pos gsung tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis //
NK103(pe)017:838: tshig tu bsdeb sbyar legs pas bshad pas brjod bya'i don kun mtshon par byed //
NK103(pe)017:839: brda don brgyud pa'i bla mas brda sprod byed la
NK103(pe)017:840: yi ger bkod pa'i man ngag gis lta ba spyi'i
NK103(pe)017:841: rnam pa tsam go bar byed yid ches pa bya
NK103(pe)017:842: bral rdzogs pa'i lung tshad ma yin no //
NK103(pe)017:843: de dag lo rgyus kyi don gyis bshad pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:844: yo ga rnam pa bzhir ye shes gsang ba las bshad pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:845: theg pa mtho dman kun gyi bsdu sa yin te //
NK103(pe)017:846: yo ga ni lha dang gtsang ba blang rtog pa
NK103(pe)017:847: dang sme ba dor ba'i spyod pa can te der
NK103(pe)017:849: ma h+aa yo ga bsnyen sgrub bzhis rtsol zhing sgrub //
NK103(pe)017:850: a nu yo ga rgyu snang ba dbyings 'bras bu dran rtog ye shes su 'dod //
NK103(pe)017:851: a ti yo ga ni de gsum ka las grol //
NK103(pe)017:852: 'di nyid mngon sum par sangs rgyas pa'i che ba yin pas ni //
NK103(pe)017:853: sde mtshan nyid gsum gyi spong 'gegs sbyong ba las
NK103(pe)017:854: grol nas rang gzhung a ti yo ga dngos yin
NK103(pe)017:855: no // chos thams cad de yin par sangs rgyas
NK103(pe)017:856: pa'i che bas blang dor thams cad dang bral ba
NK103(pe)017:857: no // ni // yo ga a ti yo gar la bzlas pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:858: rtsol sgrub kyi gzhan dbang la ltos pa rnams mi
NK103(pe)017:859: gnas te bdag nyid chen por sangs rgyas pa'i ba
NK103(pe)017:860: ni // ma h+aa yo ga a tir la bzlas pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:861: chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas pa'i che ba'i ngang
NK103(pe)017:862: las rgyu 'bras kyi mtshan ma thams cad 'das te
NK103(pe)017:863: // a nu a tir la bzlas pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:864: thams cad bla dwags kyi ming tsam du rgyas btab pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:865: thams cad du sangs rgyas med pa'i che ba yin ste //
NK103(pe)017:866: a ti yo ga'i zhen pa dang bral ba'i a ti'o //
NK103(pe)017:867: dgos ched ni gang zag dbang po yang rab la dgos ste //
NK103(pe)017:868: ri bo mchog rab la rdul du yod brtsi ba dang //
NK103(pe)017:869: bskal phran brgyad cu dang bcas pa'i bskal pa chen po la skad cig mar brtsi zhing //
NK103(pe)017:870: blo la shwa lo ka 'bum la sogs 'don zhing //
NK103(pe)017:871: tha snyad kyi bye brag du ma shes pa'i gang zag dag /
NK103(pe)017:872: dbang po yang rab ma yin te don la rtsing ba'i phyir ro //
NK103(pe)017:873: shes bya don gyi gnas lugs mthar phyin par go //
NK103(pe)017:874: rang 'dod kyi phyogs ris su blo gros ma lhungs par //
NK103(pe)017:875: blo shes bya spyi sar bzhag nas thun mong gi blos //
NK103(pe)017:876: shes bya'i rgya gcod cing don rtogs par nus pa'i //
NK103(pe)017:877: don du yang sprul dpa' bos bya bral rdzogs pa'i lung rnams gsungs pa yin no //
NK103(pe)017:878: dbu zhabs kyi don dril nas rgyud sde rang rang gi ming du gang yin btags pa yin pas //
NK103(pe)017:879: mtshan gcig pu'i don rtogs pas ni dbu zhabs kyi don kun rig pas na //
NK103(pe)017:880: dgos ched yod pas cir btags kyang mtshan der don rnams 'dus pa la //
NK103(pe)017:881: rtsa ba'i don ces bya bar gsungs pa yin no //
NK103(pe)017:882: dbu zhabs kyi dkyus bshad pa tshig gi don bstan pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:883: dbang po rab la mtshan gyis dbu zhabs kyi don kun go ba ni //
NK103(pe)017:884: rtsa ba mtshan du gcig pas dper na sman pa 'tsho byed gzhon nu gsos kyis //
NK103(pe)017:885: lag gi rtsa la bltas pas lus kyi nad kun ngos zin pa dang 'dra'o //
NK103(pe)017:886: dbang po 'bring la spyi don rnam par dbye bas tshig don kun go ba la lnga ste //
NK103(pe)017:887: rgyu gleng gzhi rkyen gleng bslang 'bras bu rgyud don
NK103(pe)017:888: rtog ge ba'i rtsod pa bzlog pa'i phyir dgos 'brel
NK103(pe)017:889: // rgyud mi nub pa'i don du gdams shing gtad pa yin no //
NK103(pe)017:890: de la bstan pa 'byung ba'i rgyu gleng gzhi kaphun sum tshogs pa lnga las //
NK103(pe)017:891: gsum pa don gsum bstan pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:892: ston pa bstan pa 'khor bstan pa //
NK103(pe)017:893: dus dang gnas ni rang bzhin tshang //
NK103(pe)017:894: phun sum tshogs pa gsum du bstan //
NK103(pe)017:896: ston gapa dang bstan pa dang 'khor dang gsum tshogs pa dag las //
NK103(pe)017:897: dus dang gnas gnyis kyang de gsum gyi cha las 'byung ba'o //
NK103(pe)017:898: ston pa chos kyi sku la 'khor 'das thams cad
NK103(pe)017:899: 'khor te de dag chos sku yin pa la rtogs
NK103(pe)017:900: ma rtogs kyi rkyen gyis 'khor 'das su shar bas
NK103(pe)017:901: so // gnas yang dag don gyi 'og min du //
NK103(pe)017:902: blo las 'das pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus gang gi tshe la //
NK103(pe)017:903: bstan pa ni bskyed rdzogs rnam pa gsum gsungs te //
NK103(pe)017:904: ma bskyed pas rang byung rang gsal ba'i ye shes su cha mthun pas //
NK103(pe)017:905: chos kyi sku'i bstan par rang byung ye shes cha mthun pas //
NK103(pe)017:906: chos kyi sku yi bstan par bshad //
NK103(pe)017:907: ces rgyud du gsungs pa yin no //
NK103(pe)017:908: ston pa longs sku yis rig pa'i 'og min gyi gansa su //
NK103(pe)017:909: sa thob pa'i rig 'dzin dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la //
NK103(pe)017:910: rang rig pa bde ba chen po shar ba'i dus su //
NK103(pe)017:911: bstan pa phyi yi theg pa gsum gsungs te //
NK103(pe)017:912: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po lha'i sku yis bsdus //
NK103(pe)017:913: snang ba cha mthun yod pas na longs sku'i bstan
NK103(pe)017:914: par gsang ba'i le'u gsum par gsungs pas rgyas par
NK103(pe)017:915: de nyid du shes par bya'o //
NK103(pe)017:916: ston pa sprul pa'i sku yis gnas stong gsum mi mjed kyi lo ka'i khams na //
NK103(pe)017:917: gnas phyogs gcig tu nges pa min thugs rjes 'dul ba'i dgos pas sprul //
NK103(pe)017:918: tshogs sbyor mos pas spyod pa'i 'khor rnams la //
NK103(pe)017:919: sdug bsngal rtsol sgrub dang bcas pa'i dus su //
NK103(pe)017:920: bstan pa mtshan nyid sde gsum gsungs ste //
NK103(pe)017:921: thub drug gi skus gdul bya 'dul ba dang mi rtog pa'i ye shes la sogs pa mthun no //
NK103(pe)017:922: ston pa gsang ba'i skus gnas yum gyi mkhar //
NK103(pe)017:923: dbu'i gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i dus su //
NK103(pe)017:924: skyes bu chags pa can gyi 'khor dag la //
NK103(pe)017:925: stong nyid dang bde chen zung du 'brel ba ni bstan pa'i gtso bo'o //
NK103(pe)017:926: ston pa ngo bo nyid kyi skus 'khor chos kyi sku la //
NK103(pe)017:927: 'das ma 'ongs da ltar 'byung bar ma nges pa dus bzhi mnyam pa'i dus de nyid la //
NK103(pe)017:928: rten dang brten pa tha dad mi gnas pa yi gnas su //
NK103(pe)017:929: theg pa kun gyi bcud 'dus pa'i rang grol ba'i mngon sum pa'i bstan pa ste //
NK103(pe)017:930: gang gis kyang ma bsgribs par don mthong zhing thos te rang la shar ba'o //
NK103(pe)017:931: dang po chos longs sprul gsum gyi gleng gzhi ni spyi gzhung dang mthun la //
NK103(pe)017:932: gcig gsang ba'i ni gdul bya chags can gyis mthun pa'i phyogs sur drangs pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:933: mthar thug tha ma ngo bo nyid kyi gleng gzhi ni kun gyi thun mong min //
NK103(pe)017:934: theg pa kun gyi gnas yin la kun gyi gtso bo ru //
NK103(pe)017:935: kun grol chen po'i rgyud sde rnams las grags pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:936: rgyu gleng gzhi de las bstan pa'i 'byung ba'i rkyen
NK103(pe)017:937: gyis gleng bslang ba ni gang zhe na ston pas
NK103(pe)017:938: mdun bsu shaste sngon nas gleng bslang ba ni gsang
NK103(pe)017:940: 'khor gyis gus sapas dri ba dris te gleng bslang ba ni khyod ni gsung gi zhes //
NK103(pe)017:941: zhus lan 'dren mar byung ba rnams ni /
NK103(pe)017:942: haskabs las gleng du langs pa yin //
NK103(pe)017:943: ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor bas 'khor bskul te gleng bslang ba rdzogs pa las /
NK103(pe)017:944: de nas rig pa'i rgyal po sna tshogs zhes drangs dang //
NK103(pe)017:945: lha'i dbang pos gzhan sems lhag can gyi don du
NK103(pe)017:946: zhu bas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang dag bskul bas
NK103(pe)017:948: thams cad kyis rdor sems la bstan pa gsung harnams
NK103(pe)017:949: tshig tu gsungs shig par nan tan gyis bskul ba
NK103(pe)017:950: ni // man ngag dam pa dag gis bskul ba'o //
NK103(pe)017:951: rkyen skyur rtsi phabs kyis rgyu 'bru las bslangs pa yis chang byung ba ltar //
NK103(pe)017:952: 'bras bu rgyud kyi don 'byung ba'i rkyen du gleng
NK103(pe)017:953: bslang bas gleng bslang du ming nges pa yin no
NK103(pe)017:954: // rgyu gleng gzhi tsam gnas pa las rkyen gleng bslang dang bral na //
NK103(pe)017:955: 'bras bu rgyud don 'grub pa min pa des na gleng bslang gi dgos pa'i don yin no //
NK103(pe)017:956: gsung khaba'am gleng ba'i rgyud 'byung ba'i kyi gzhir phun sum tshogs pa lnga gyur pas //
NK103(pe)017:957: gleng langs pa bstan pa'i gzhi ru ming nges pa yin no //
NK103(pe)017:958: dper na rtsod pa'i phan tshun gyi rgyu blo yul
NK103(pe)017:959: bar pa zhal che ba rnams tshogs pa dang 'dra'o
NK103(pe)017:960: // dad ldan gang zag gi rjes su 'brang ba rnams 'jug pa'i phyir du //
NK103(pe)017:961: sdud pa po tshad ma'i skyes bur gzhag pa brgyad stong don bsdu las /
NK103(pe)017:962: dad ldan 'jug pa'i yan lag tu //
NK103(pe)017:963: ston pa dbang po 'khor dang ni //
NK103(pe)017:964: yul dus dag kyang nges bstan pa //
NK103(pe)017:965: sdud po rang nyid tshad mar ni //
NK103(pe)017:966: rab grub phyir yin 'jig rten na //
NK103(pe)017:967: yul dang dus kyis nges mtshon cing //
NK103(pe)017:968: dpang por bcas pa smra ba ni //
NK103(pe)017:969: smra po tshad mar rjes su rtogs //
NK103(pe)017:970: zhes phyogs glang gis gsungs so //
NK103(pe)017:973: 'bras bu'i yon tan gyis brod pa bskyed pas des thob pa'i thabs la brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
NK103(pe)017:974: dad ldan gyi gang zag 'jug pa'i phyir phun sum tshogs pa lnga smos pa'i dgos pa yin no //
NK103(pe)017:975: dus phun sum tshogs pa'i kyi sgo nas gleng gzhi nye bar dgod pa ni /
NK103(pe)017:976: 'di zhes nye ba mngon sum bar bstan pa'i sgra ni gnas 'dir ni gsungs she'o //
NK103(pe)017:977: chos sku skye med don gyi 1longs sku brda dgongs
NK103(pe)017:978: kyi 1sprul sku tshangs pa'i skad 1111ltar du mtshon pa
NK103(pe)017:979: ni ston pa / ston pasa 'khor la dgongs nas bshad pa ste /
NK103(pe)017:980: pa zhes 'phro tshul ba'i sgra ni bstan pa phun tshogs dngos la 'jug la //
NK103(pe)017:981: sku lnga'i dus lnga ni sngar bshad bzhin te 'dir dus matha'i skad cig ma /
NK103(pe)017:982: brjod bya klong dgu la rjod byed bam po nyi khri gsungs pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:983: sdud pa po rnam par thar pa thob pa yis skad cig la khong du chud pa //
NK103(pe)017:984: mang du 'byung ba ma yin par bka' dkon pa'i phyir skad cig la gsungs pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:985: gzhan las ma brgyud par bdag gis dbang po'i mngon sum du //
NK103(pe)017:986: thos zhes brjod pa tsam gyis sdud pa po tshad ma'i skyes bur mi rung bas na /
NK103(pe)017:987: tshad mar nges par bshad ces pas 'gyur de ston pa dang /
NK103(pe)017:988: sdud pa po gnyis dgongs pa dbyer med chig chod yin no //
NK103(pe)017:989: gzhan rgyas pa dag gong du bshad pa bzhin skabs 'dir shes par bya'o //
NK103(pe)017:990: 'bras bu rgyud nga kyi don la gnas lugs dang thabs lam dang 'bras bu dang gsum //
NK103(pe)017:991: dkrugs pa rnams ni rim pas de ltar bsdebs te
NK103(pe)017:992: rgyud kyi dkyus las gong 'og tu yod pa rnams
NK103(pe)017:993: de ltar bsgrig / rgyu gleng gzhi rkyen gleng bslang tshogs pa las byung ba'i phyir //
NK103(pe)017:994: 'bras bu rgyud kyi don bya bar ming nges pa yin no //
NK103(pe)017:995: tshig lam gyi dgos pa bshad pa ltar skabs 'dir yang de bzhin du mthun no //
NK103(pe)017:996: don gyi gdams pas rgyud kyi don dgrol bar bya'o //
NK103(pe)017:997: gang zag rtog ldan chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba
NK103(pe)017:998: 'jug pa'i phyir du dgos 'brel yan lag bzhi ni
NK103(pe)017:999: // byang chub kyi sems lhun grub gsum gyi rang bzhin du //
NK103(pe)017:1000: ye nas gnas pa la mi gsal bar rtog pas
NK103(pe)017:1001: bsgribs pa ni dper na phyi nang gi rgya mtsho
NK103(pe)017:1002: chen po'i gser gyi 'og gzhi mi gsal ba ltar
NK103(pe)017:1003: // rang bzhin gyi snang ba brjod pa'i yul dang
NK103(pe)017:1004: bral ba de nyid brjod par bya ba'i yul lo
NK103(pe)017:1005: // // thun mong ston pa sh+aakya thub pas rtsol bcas kyi theg pa'i chos rnams //
NK103(pe)017:1006: mthar phyin par gsungs te mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lha phrug sems lhag can gi //
NK103(pe)017:1007: don du lha'i dbang pos phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la
NK103(pe)017:1008: gsol ba btab ste gsang ba'i le'u dang po ltar
NK103(pe)017:1009: ro // ngang gis gsal ba rig pa'i skyes bu chen po de //
NK103(pe)017:1010: chos kun gyi ngo bor rang bzhin gyis gnas pas //
NK103(pe)017:1011: nyi ma las 'od ltar du rang snang ba gnyis longs sku la /
NK103(pe)017:1012: don tha mi dad gyi shugs kyis bskul ba de grags pa ltar du snang la //
NK103(pe)017:1013: de'i thugs las rang snang ba'i rdo rje 'dzin pa
NK103(pe)017:1014: yis ra chod bsal ba'i dgos pa yod pas rigs
NK103(pe)017:1015: lnga la the tshom bzhi bcad nas //
NK103(pe)017:1016: yang sprul dga' rab rdo rje thugs sras kyi ngo bor mdzad de //
NK103(pe)017:1017: bka' lung dang man ngag gi rim pa ma lus par snang bar mdzad pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:1018: rtsol bral gyi theg pa gnas phyir du nges par bden pa yin //
NK103(pe)017:1019: de yang the tshom yul gyur to zhe na //
NK103(pe)017:1020: bka' 'o cog thams cad kyang de dang 'dra bas //
NK103(pe)017:1021: don du 'gyur ba'i the tshom tsam zhig re zhig skye bar rigs so //
NK103(pe)017:1022: theg pa kun kyang gzhung lugs tha dad pa min te //
NK103(pe)017:1023: bslab byar ma gyur pa med par gsungs pa dang sbyor cig pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:1024: de la nyon mongs dang shes sgrib gnyis 1bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis 1byang 1rdzogs 1nas11 //
NK103(pe)017:1025: phun sum tshogs pas 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pa'i gang zag de //
NK103(pe)017:1026: rjod byed tshig lam gyi rkyen gyis brjod bya'i don mtshon pa la brten nas //
NK103(pe)017:1027: don gyi lam rtogs pa rang gi rgyud la gsal bar shar bas //
NK103(pe)017:1028: lam des gdul bya gzhan 'dren pa ni dgos pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:1029: gzhi'i nyes pa sdug bsngal dang lam gyi nyes pa rtsol ba'i nad las grol nas //
NK103(pe)017:1030: mthar thug bde chen gyi 'bras bu rang las shar
NK103(pe)017:1031: te gdul bya kun sgrol ba'i gzugs sku gnyis byin
NK103(pe)017:1032: gyis brlabs la snang ba ni dgos pa'i yang dgos
NK103(pe)017:1033: pa'o // gnas lugs dang lam pa dang 'bras bu dag /
NK103(pe)017:1034: gser gong las byas pa'i rdzas mi 'dra ba rnams
NK103(pe)017:1035: ngo bo gser du gcig pa bzhin du ngo bos
NK103(pe)017:1037: gnas palugs dang de ston ba par byed pa'i tshig gi lam dang don gyi phalam //
NK103(pe)017:1038: mtshan pagzhi dang mtshon byed kyi mtshan phanyid dang mtshon ba par 'brel la //
NK103(pe)017:1039: 'bras ra bu dang don lalam dang lam shapa dag /
NK103(pe)017:1040: thob rapar bya ba dang 'thob la par byed pa dang thob par sha'brel cing //
NK103(pe)017:1042: thabs 1las byung ba dang de'i cha 1rkyen gyi thabs su 'brel te //
NK103(pe)017:1043: 'khrul kaba'i snang ba ni de min pa la der 'dzin pa yin pas //
NK103(pe)017:1044: de nyid rang kha grol bar byed pa'i lam gyis
NK103(pe)017:1045: grol te mthar gaphyin gyi 'bras bu byung khabas gnas
NK103(pe)017:1046: skabs kyi 'brel pa byas pa tsam las mthar thug
NK103(pe)017:1047: ngo bos bdag gcig par 'brel lo //
NK103(pe)017:1048: 'og ma pa dang mthun par bstan pas rtog ldan
NK103(pe)017:1049: 'dir 'jug pa dag don la drang bar bya ba'i
NK103(pe)017:1051: rgyud mi nub par bya ba'i phyir gtad pa la yang //
NK103(pe)017:1052: bstan pa nub pa'i rgyu ni snyan khung brgyud pa'i gdams ngag dang bral bas //
NK103(pe)017:1053: don ma rtogs par sgra'i rjes su dpyad pas don gyi lam la 'gyangs te thag ring //
NK103(pe)017:1054: 'dir 'jug pa'i gang zag gi blo sun dbyung bar 'gyur ba des na gdams shing gtad //
NK103(pe)017:1055: gsang ba'i le'u tha ma las /
NK103(pe)017:1056: mtshan gyi rnam grangs nyon mongs zhen pa'i phreng thag gcod /
NK103(pe)017:1057: ces pa la sogs pa brjod de snying gi dkyil du btsa' bar gyis //
NK103(pe)017:1058: srog dang bral ba'i kha bzhin bsdam //
NK103(pe)017:1059: bstan pa'i yang snying snying ltar zung /
NK103(pe)017:1062: dar drags na nyams par 'gyur bas shin tu bsdam //
NK103(pe)017:1063: bud med kyi tshogs ma mo gsum la gtad pas na //
NK103(pe)017:1065: gnas ni brag dang chu la bzhag /
NK103(pe)017:1067: rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su glegs bam btsa' //
NK103(pe)017:1068: de yis 'khor bkra shis pa dang tshe 'dzin te
NK103(pe)017:1069: ring ba dang byin brlabs kyi stongs grogs byed pa
NK103(pe)017:1070: // des na legs par nan tan du bya'o //
NK103(pe)017:1071: nan tan ma byas pa'i skyon kyang gong gi yon
NK103(pe)017:1072: tan de las bzlog pa dang mtshungs pa yin no
NK103(pe)017:1073: // dbang po tha ma'i don du rgyud bshad pa la //
NK103(pe)017:1074: rgyud nyid kyis ni rgyud bshad pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:1075: bshad pa'i thabs bcu yis drangs te rgyud kyi don dgrol ba ni //
NK103(pe)017:1076: rang gi shes pa'i rgyud dgrol bar rab tu gces la //
NK103(pe)017:1077: lung gis rgyud kyi man ngag gi rgyud bshad pa'i thabs ni //
NK103(pe)017:1078: 'dren gang 'dir 'dren pa zhes drang pa'i tshig bcus drangs te rgyud kyi don dgrol ba ni //
NK103(pe)017:1079: dkyus kyi tshig dgrol bar bya ba la 'thad pa yin no //
NK103(pe)017:1080: don gyi 'grel pa 'grel lnga gang dang gang zhe na /
NK103(pe)017:1083: gtan tshigs don gyi 'grel pa dang /
NK103(pe)017:1086: zhes mdo bcu las gsungs so //
NK103(pe)017:1088: don gzhi thabs lam nges pa 'bras bus rgyud kyi khog phub ste //
NK103(pe)017:1089: bsdus don rnam par dbye bas dkyus kyi sa gcad do //
NK103(pe)017:1090: 'bru stong mi gzhag par tshig gi 'bru gnan zhing //
NK103(pe)017:1091: gtan tshigs kyi don gyis the tshom gyi gegs bsal //
NK103(pe)017:1092: man ngag gi don gyis rang gi rgyud thog tu nyams su blang ba'o //
NK103(pe)017:1093: gzhi ni shes bya'i don ni shes byed kyi lam thabs dpe don rgyu 'bras 'grel pa 'dis /
NK103(pe)017:1095: chos de la ni ming du 'dogs /
NK103(pe)017:1096: 'bras bu ni nges par shes pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:1097: rgyud kyi tshig don ngo bstan pa yi 'grel par
NK103(pe)017:1098: bshad tha dad pa rnam gsum po der bsdus ngos
NK103(pe)017:1099: gzung bar bya'o // sde mdo bcu las /
NK103(pe)017:1101: so so dag gi ngo bstan nas //
NK103(pe)017:1102: sde dang tshan ni ris su 'byed //
NK103(pe)017:1103: sa gcod pa yi 'grel par bshad //
NK103(pe)017:1105: rgyu rkyen 'bras bu dgos 'brel gtad pa lta bu
NK103(pe)017:1106: che long 1du de dag gi nang tshegs zhib mor
NK103(pe)017:1108: gong 'og gi mtshams sbyor ba'i 'brel tsheg bar 'bru yi 'grel pa yis //
NK103(pe)017:1109: tsheg dang 'bru dang tshig min lta //
NK103(pe)017:1110: 'bru la lhag ma mi ltas te //
NK103(pe)017:1112: pa ni ngo bo'i don tshig gi mi gsal ba
NK103(pe)017:1113: shugs kyi dbyung ba tsheg bar 'bru yi tshigs shugs
NK103(pe)017:1114: kyis // gong ma'i shugs dang 'og ma'i shugs //
NK103(pe)017:1115: bar mar 'brel pa bdag shugs kyis //
NK103(pe)017:1116: gang yin pa ni brtag par bya'o //
NK103(pe)017:1118: dang don gyis yod par sbyar ba'o //
NK103(pe)017:1119: thog babs ma 'khrugs pa rnams thad 1ka bshad 'thor 1ba rnams phyogs gcig tu 11bsdu ba dang /
NK103(pe)017:1120: sgra ji bzhin pa'i nges don rnams sgra drang thad
NK103(pe)017:1121: 1du drang don tshig don mi mthun pa rnams dgongs
NK103(pe)017:1123: lus mdor bstan dang yan lag rgyas par bshad pa'i sgra'i 'gros brda //
NK103(pe)017:1124: sgra'i stobs kyis don gar 'gyur gnad kyis brtag /
NK103(pe)017:1125: don gzhan gtso bor ston pa'i 'bru mang po ba 1dang yar mar gyi grangs kyi 1'gyur 1brtag1 /
NK103(pe)017:1126: tshig gi las bzhin don kyang der 'gyur bar sgra'i shugs kyis barda'o //
NK103(pe)017:1127: sgra 2don 1gnad yan lag lnga ldan kyis zhen pa'i 'brel pas sgras don mtshon pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:1128: rang gi blo gtan tshigs don gyi 'grel pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:1129: ma nor ba yi snying po 'byin //
NK103(pe)017:1130: nges par gtan la 'bebs pa yin //
NK103(pe)017:1132: la snang ba'i the tshom gyi gegs rnams //
NK103(pe)017:1133: gtan tshigs kyi 'thad pa dang tshad ma gsum gyis yid ches par bya'o //
NK103(pe)017:1134: tha snyad tshad mas don cir mtshon kyang //
NK103(pe)017:1135: phyogs kun nas don mtshon cing rang gi rgyud thog tu dbab //
NK103(pe)017:1136: don brda dang bral bar rang la bzlog ste nyams su blang //
NK103(pe)017:1137: shes bya'i don gyi steng du nan tan bya ba ni sdud par byed pa'i 'grel pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:1138: chos kun rtsa ba gcig bsdus nas //
NK103(pe)017:1139: spros pa med pa'i don du ston //
NK103(pe)017:1140: don sdud pa yi 'grel par bshad //
NK103(pe)017:1141: nyams su blang ba'i don dril ba chen po'i don du nges pa'o //
NK103(pe)017:1142: gzhi ji ltar gnas pa'i don mngon sum du rtogs pa las //
NK103(pe)017:1143: goms pas nges par brtan na ngan song ngam 'khor
NK103(pe)017:1144: bar slar mi ldog par rtsol med bde chen gyi
NK103(pe)017:1145: yon tan rtogs goms kyi shugs las 'char ba /
NK103(pe)017:1146: de tsam ni don la 'jug pa lam gyi chos yin no //
NK103(pe)017:1147: de ltar du lam mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu la //
NK103(pe)017:1148: ngo bo dang rang bzhin dang nges pa'i tshig dang /
NK103(pe)017:1149: rnam par dbye ba dang dus dang lnga yis dabye'o //
NK103(pe)017:1150: ngo bo ni sems nyid ye nas rang gsal ba'i don lam gyis mthar phyin pas /
NK103(pe)017:1151: gzhi ma rig pa dang lam rtsol ba dang zhor
NK103(pe)017:1152: snang gis brtags pa'i duhkha dang gsum gyi skyon rnams
NK103(pe)017:1153: ma spangs bral ba yin no //
NK103(pe)017:1154: gnas lugs rang bzhin gyi snang ba ni tha snyad kun gyi gdags su rung gzhi can gyi /
NK103(pe)017:1155: tha snyad rnams rang sar grol bar lam gyis mngon du shar bas //
NK103(pe)017:1156: yang na mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid kyi pa'i chos tha
NK103(pe)017:1157: snyad kun las rang las grol kyang mtshan nyid kyang
NK103(pe)017:1158: tha snyad kun gyi mtshan pa'i gdags pa'i gzhi //
NK103(pe)017:1159: rang snang ji lta ba nyid du lam gyis mthar son pa yin no //
NK103(pe)017:1160: sems sangs rgyas kyi rgyu tsam las rkyen tshogs gnyis gyis 'bras bu ru bsgyur ba min la //
NK103(pe)017:1161: lam mthar phyin te de las bskyed du byar med pas //
NK103(pe)017:1162: smin pa'i phyir 'bras bu zhes bya bar brdar btags pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:1163: de dang don mthun pa'i ming du nges pa'i tshig yin no //
NK103(pe)017:1164: dbye ba ni rgyas par yang sprul dpa' bo yis //
NK103(pe)017:1165: nges pa 'bras bu'i klong du sku dang ye shes rdzogs pa che //
NK103(pe)017:1166: rnam pas byang chub snying por gnas //
NK103(pe)017:1167: zhes gsungs par shes par bya'o //
NK103(pe)017:1168: de gnas pa'i dus la thog ma med cing mthar mi nub pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:1169: rgyu la mi gnas zhes drang gnas lugs kyi skabs su bstan pa bzhin du 'dir shes par bya //
NK103(pe)017:1170: rgyud dag dus kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i dang po ni //
NK103(pe)017:1171: gang zag rang rang nam grol ba'i tshe'i skabs las sbyar ba'o //
NK103(pe)017:1172: gzhan dag bshad bzhin rig par gyis //
NK103(pe)017:1173: gnas lugs ma nor bar rang snang ba la ma
NK103(pe)017:1174: rig pas bsgribs pas 'khrul snang du shar ba la
NK103(pe)017:1175: lam brgyud pa'i gdams pas sgrib byed dang bral bar
NK103(pe)017:1176: mngon du byas pas 'bras bu mthar phyin te mi
NK103(pe)017:1178: ldog cha las gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum du bgrangs kyis don dbyer med gyis ngo bo gcig /
NK103(pe)017:1179: rkyen shugs kyi mthu yis bstan pa'i thabs yin no //
NK103(pe)017:1180: yang sprul dpa' bos don mtshon pa'i thabs su tshig sdeb sbyor legs pas gsungs la /
NK103(pe)017:1181: gsang sngags bdag po'i dgongs pas rgyud sde rnams tshig tu bsdus //
NK103(pe)017:1182: longs sku'i brda yis don bkrol chos sku yi //
NK103(pe)017:1183: byin gyi rlabs las rang snang bas gsal bar mdzad
NK103(pe)017:1184: pa'i rgyud dang man ngag rnams slob dpon mi sten
NK103(pe)017:1185: par rang yan du 'jug pas rtogs pa ma yin
NK103(pe)017:1186: pa'i phyir gzhi lam 'bras bu'i don rnams tshang la
NK103(pe)017:1187: 'thor bu dkrugs pas gab pa yin kyang rgya gar
NK103(pe)017:1188: ba rnams mi brjed pa'i gzungs dang ldan zhing sgras
NK103(pe)017:1190: sang+k+ri ta lha'i skad la de'i nus mthu dang ldan
NK103(pe)017:1191: pas shes pa'i rgyud la bsdebs te brgyud pas bsdeb
NK103(pe)017:1193: dge slong bee ro tsa na gzhi dad pa grogs
NK103(pe)017:1194: brtson 'grus dang brtser dam tshig dang ldan pa la
NK103(pe)017:1195: // rgyal po khri srong lde btsan spyan ras gzigs
NK103(pe)017:1196: kyi sprul pa ser sna spangs pa la sogs pa
NK103(pe)017:1197: // // mtha' 'khor pa rnams sgra'i mthu zhan cing mi brjed pa'i gzungs dang bral bas //
NK103(pe)017:1198: ra chod can la gab pa la bsdebs pa'i don mtshon pa'i thabs kyi tshig /
NK103(pe)017:1199: rin chen gyi ming gi don dang ldan pa mdzes par rgyan bkod pa ni //
NK103(pe)017:1200: sku gsum gyi bka' lung brgyud pa yi //
NK103(pe)017:1201: bla ma dam pa mchog ku ku r+aa dza'i gdams pa la //
NK103(pe)017:1202: rang rig pa'i nyams tshad ma dang ldan pa la snying brtser bas kun slong bcas te //
NK103(pe)017:1203: rgya mtsho'i bcud bsrubs te bsdus pas nor bu rin chen byung ba dang //
NK103(pe)017:1204: ngang pa rab dga' sa rgya mtsho las 'o ma blangs pa ltar du //
NK103(pe)017:1205: bka'i bcud phyung ste don bsdus pa'i dge ba 'dis //
NK103(pe)017:1206: sems can thams cad rnal ma'i don la mos pa
NK103(pe)017:1207: dang ldan te 'khrul pa rang par grol bar shog
NK103(pe)017:1208: cig pa'o // rin po che rgyan a tsar+ya slob
NK103(pe)017:1209: dpon sh+r+ai dpal seng+ha seng ge pra b+ha ta'i 'od
NK103(pe)017:1210: can gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa /
NK103(pe)017:1211: rgya gar gyi mkhas pa de nyid dang /
NK103(pe)017:1212: bod kyi lo ts+aa ba dge slong bee ro tsa nas /
NK103(pe)017:1213: yul d+ha he na'i 'du khang du zhus shing bod
NK103(pe)017:1214: skad du bsgyur te gtan la ma nor bar phab
NK103(pe)017:1215: pa // tshig bzhi la shwa lo ka gcig ste
NK103(pe)017:1216: de nyis brgya dang rtsa brgyad dang tshig gi rkang
NK103(pe)017:1217: pa // pa gcig pa'o // rdzogs so////
NK103(pe)017:1219: rang rtog dang mthun mchan bu 'di //
NK103(pe)017:1220: brtse ba'i sems kyis btab pa yin //
